5001.name: EXP
5001.description: Good job. Keep it up and get stronger. As long as you don't give up, your efforts will pay off in the end.
5001.usage: Experience gained from battle. It shows how far you've come.

SOCIAL_PT.name: Credit
SOCIAL_PT.description: Credit holds communities together and stands as a symbol of social stability. Sometimes it's even more valuable than money, so do please cherish it.
SOCIAL_PT.usage: A token of friendship. Can be used to exchange items from the Store.
SOCIAL_PT.obtainApproach: Friend Support, Support Units, Dormitory Ambience, Clue Exchange

AP_GAMEPLAY.name: Sanity
AP_GAMEPLAY.description: 'What is it that distinguishes us from this land? Our breath, or feeling? Or life and death?'
AP_GAMEPLAY.usage: The mental capacity to remain self aware, draw up plans, and execute them.

6001.name: Drill Plan
6001.description: Haste makes waste. For Rhodes Island, every operation has the potential for a loss of life. Therefore, it is wise to drill before actual combat, long before we run into an enemy ambush.
6001.usage: A plan used for tactical drills. Use it on the operation interface to simulate a battle so you can make plans accordingly.

base_ap.name: Drone
base_ap.description: Drones used for construction. They are controlled by the Rhodes Island Logistics Department. Without them, Operators would have to wait 10 times as long to get base housing.
base_ap.usage: A machine that is important for the Base construction of Rhodes Island. Can be used to clean, construct, and upgrade base facilities.

bilibili001.name: Preregister to get 1 of 4 Operators randomly
bilibili001.description: Who will it be? Can't wait!

4002.name: Originite Prime
4002.description: Widely used in industry, this Originium crystal is difficult to extract. Its production requires very fine processing, but it remains the major energy source of the world and the foundation of Originium Arts. Even if widespread rumors claim 'Originite Prime spreads an incurable disease,' few can resist its temptation.
4002.usage: Dangerous but necessary, this precious material is widely used across many fields.

4003.name: Orundum
4003.description: Made from Originite Prime, it also contains other minerals. In the past, it was used only as a conductive element, but it has since become a store of credit value.
4003.usage: An artificial material commonly used to recruit operators.

3141.name: Originium Shard
3141.description: An Originium shard collected from heavily contaminated regions. Anyone who touches it has a high chance to get infected and even mutate. Therefore, it is a hazardous material as indicated in the Columbia CDC toxicity database.
3141.usage: An Originium shard collected from polluted regions. Can be used to produce Orundum.

4001.name: LMD
4001.description: Since the financial crisis, economic decline and political instability have stood in the way of trade. The widespread circulation of Lungmen Dollars has allowed for some recovery in the business world.
4001.usage: A widely used currency issued by Lungmen.

3003.name: Pure Gold
3003.description: How much ore does it take to make such valuable gold bars? It doesn't matter. What matters is that they're yours.
3003.usage: A refined gold bar. Can be exchanged for a lot of LMD.

4004.name: Distinction Certificate
4004.description: The Infection Isolation Act is the last vestige of modern nation states. As long as you have some special ability, it is but a meaningless piece of paper. (The words of her Leithanian mentor.)
4004.usage: A certificate that attests to an operator's distinguished accomplishments and expertise. Can be exchanged for rare items.

4005.name: Commendation Certificate
4005.description: Good help is hard to find in troubled times, especially when trying to do it secretly. It's like finding a needle in a haystack, but what if Rhodes Island were to become the haystack? Would that save some time?
4005.usage: A certificate that attests to an operator's skills and qualifications. Can be exchanged for items.

4006.name: Purchase Certificate
4006.description: The operations at Rhodes Island require substantial funding and a variety of materials. Therefore, we must trade in diverse markets in order to keep everything running
4006.usage: A certificate describing the business and operational capacities of Rhodes Island. Can be exchanged for items.

LMTGS_COIN_601.name: Headhunting Data Contract
LMTGS_COIN_601.description: A long-term, stable relationship with the headhunting agency can effectively control our expenditures. However, we hope that this method will not be required every time.
LMTGS_COIN_601.usage: A time-limited currency arranged for a new type of headhunting contract; Collect enough to recruit an operator from a designated pool for a limited time

LMTGS_COIN_3001.description: A long-term, stable relationship with the headhunting agency can effectively control our expenditures. However, we hope that this method will not be required every time.
LMTGS_COIN_3001.usage: A time-limited currency arranged for a new type of headhunting contract; Collect enough to recruit an operator from a designated pool for a limited time

EPGS_COIN.name: Headhunting Parametric Model
EPGS_COIN.description: The fact that the headhunting agency has taken this consideration proves its sincerity. A word of warning though - if you seek to exploit this method for profit, I'm afraid the consequences will far outweigh any gains.
EPGS_COIN.usage: A new product, born of processing data from expired headhunting contracts; Can be exchanged for certain supplies.
EPGS_COIN.obtainApproach: Automatically obtained when Headhunting Data expires

REP_COIN.name: Intelligence Certificate
REP_COIN.description: In order to encourage Operators to proactively replay and review past events, upper management decided to initiate long-term activities that would grant a voucher for replaying prior operations. The voucher can be taken to the HR Department to exchange for various supplies, and the designated events are randomly selected by the system.
REP_COIN.usage: A reward for reviewing past events; Can be used to exchange for various supplies.

CRISIS_SHOP_COIN.name: Contract Bounty
CRISIS_SHOP_COIN.description: The ruthless but effective bounty mechanism is the only way to ensure the normal operations of the Contingency Contract system.
CRISIS_SHOP_COIN.usage: Rewards earned after completing a contract. Can be used to redeem supplies.

STORY_REVIEW_COIN.name: Information Fragments
STORY_REVIEW_COIN.description:
An auxiliary function of Rhodes Island's intelligence processing system. After extracting effective intelligence from a complex batch of information, the system was able to recreate images of past events with astonishing fidelity.
The information was packaged as videotapes to make it easier for ordinary people to understand.
STORY_REVIEW_COIN.usage: A topological model of effective intelligence that can be used to reconstruct past events.

RETRO_COIN.name: Event Crystal
RETRO_COIN.description:
An auxiliary function of Rhodes Island's intelligence processing system. After extracting effective intelligence from a mass of information, the system is able to recreate images of past events. Information extracted through crystallization is typically of greater importance.
Its synthesis into optical disc form is simply for easier understanding by the layperson.
RETRO_COIN.usage: A topological model of aggregated information. Can be used to rebuild past events.

renamingCard.name: ID Info Update Card
renamingCard.description: Don't waste the precious chance to do a system update.
renamingCard.usage: ID Info Update Card for a system upgrade to the Rhodes Island bridge. This one is for you, Doctor.

ap_supply_lt_100.name: Top Emergency Sanity Potion
ap_supply_lt_100.description: It contains a small amount of mustard extract, so please keep it away from your eyes (other instructions omitted). When the situation is so dire that you need to use it to restore Sanity, you won't have the time to read this. Good luck!
ap_supply_lt_100.usage: A large dose of emergency supplement that will swiftly clear your mind. Possible side effect: migraine.

ap_supply_lt_60.name: Emergency Sanity Potion
ap_supply_lt_60.description: Although overeating can relieve the anxiety and pressure accumulated on the battlefield, it's not a healthy lifestyle, Doctor. This supplement contains quite a bit of sugar, but the packing is specially designed to be hard to open. Treat it as a kind of exercise and burn some calories.
ap_supply_lt_60.usage: An emergency supplement used to maintain Sanity and keep your mind clear.

ap_supply_lt_010.name: Emergency Sanity Sampler
ap_supply_lt_010.description: A low-dosage sample. To be used rationally and sensibly. If you are satisfied with this product's efficacy, you may also be interested in our other packages.
ap_supply_lt_010.usage: A portable, easy-to-carry sampler that is good for maintaining a level of Sanity during emergencies.

ap_supply_lt_100_2022_1.name: Vegetable Radish Tin
ap_supply_lt_100_2022_1.description: The tinned food Kroos often eats on field missions. Worried it won't suit you, she's sprinkled some salt in it just for you.
ap_supply_lt_100_2022_1.usage: A dish from an Operator's hometown. Can be used to restore Sanity.

ap_supply_lt_100_2022_2.name: Frozen Kung Pao Diced Fowlbeast
ap_supply_lt_100_2022_2.description: Waai Fu is hardly good at cooking, but she can handle heating up some frozen food.
ap_supply_lt_100_2022_2.usage: A dish from an Operator's hometown. Can be used to restore Sanity.

ap_supply_lt_100_2022_3.name: Karlan Chargrill Barbecue Ribs with Truffle Paste
ap_supply_lt_100_2022_3.description: Victorian condiments paired with immortalized Kjerag ways. The taste of the ribs is fine beyond words.
ap_supply_lt_100_2022_3.usage: A dish from an Operator's hometown. Can be used to restore Sanity.

ap_supply_lt_100_2022_4.name: Edible Cubes
ap_supply_lt_100_2022_4.description: Kal'tsit saw to it the cubes before you have both nutrition and flavor, but you still can't tell how these were made.
ap_supply_lt_100_2022_4.usage: A crystallization of science. Can be used to restore Sanity.

ap_supply_lt_100_2022_5.name: Rim Billiton Watermelon Cake
ap_supply_lt_100_2022_5.description: Times of reunion call for getting together and eating sweet, sweet stuff. Do you need her to feed you?
ap_supply_lt_100_2022_5.usage: A dish from Amiya's hometown. Can be used to restore Sanity.

ap_supply_lt_120.name: Emergency Sanity Concentrate
ap_supply_lt_120.description: This product's effectiveness has been boosted to a degree thanks to modern concentrative technologies. By no means should it be used as medication. When the situation is so dire that you need it to restore Sanity, you won't have the time to read this. Good luck!
ap_supply_lt_120.usage: A large dose of concentrated emergency supplement used to maintain Sanity. New active ingredients, same instant results. Possible side effect: disruption of biological clock. Please read carefully before administering.

ap_supply_lt_80.name: Emergency Sanity Booster
ap_supply_lt_80.description: Although overeating can relieve the anxiety and pressure accumulated on the battlefield, it's not a healthy lifestyle, Doctor. This supplement contains quite a bit of sugar, but the packing is specially designed to be hard to open. Treat it as a kind of exercise and burn some calories.
ap_supply_lt_80.usage: An emergency supplement with lightly increased dosage, used to maintain Sanity. Keep your mind clear and drive out fatigue.

ap_supply_lt_120_2022_1.name: Full Color
ap_supply_lt_120_2022_1.description: A crisp, flaky mooncake in golden brown, liable to stir anyone's appetite.
ap_supply_lt_120_2022_1.usage: A flaky mooncake filled with perky sweet ground meat. Can be used to restore Sanity.

ap_supply_lt_120_2022_2.name: Full Moon
ap_supply_lt_120_2022_2.description: A crisp, flaky mooncake in golden brown, liable to stir anyone's appetite.
ap_supply_lt_120_2022_2.usage: A flaky mooncake filled with frankincense Yunnan ham. Can be used to restore Sanity.

ap_supply_lt_120_2022_3.name: Smiley Face
ap_supply_lt_120_2022_3.description: A tender, sugary mooncake with a glossy sheen, prone to making anyone drool at the mouth.
ap_supply_lt_120_2022_3.usage: A glazed mooncake filled with rose red bean paste. Can be used to restore Sanity.

ap_supply_lt_120_2022_4.name: Osmanthus
ap_supply_lt_120_2022_4.description: A tender, sugary mooncake with a glossy sheen, prone to making anyone drool at the mouth.
ap_supply_lt_120_2022_4.usage: A glazed mooncake filled with spicy and salty nuts. Can be used to restore Sanity.

EXTERMINATION_AGENT.name: PRTS Proxy Annihilation Card
EXTERMINATION_AGENT.description: Based on a massive volume of live combat records, PRTS can perfectly replicate your tactics to conduct annihilation missions by proxy, using actuarial data processing, logic training, and scenario simulation. You're spared even the need to pay it your full attention.
EXTERMINATION_AGENT.usage: A card granting load distribution privileges for PRTS. Once activated, allows PRTS to conduct Annihilation battles as your proxy.

7004.name: Ten-roll Headhunting Permit
7004.description: When Rhodes Island is need of skilled operators, our normal permits may not make efficient use of our headhunting company contractors. In order to accelerate the development of Rhodes Island, the Human Resource Department has issued these permits for headhunting in batches.
7004.usage: A permit issued by the Human Resource Department of Rhodes Island. Can be used to recruit 10 Operators at a time through headhunting companies.

LIMITED_TKT_GACHA_10_903.name: Awakening Commemoration Permit
LIMITED_TKT_GACHA_10_903.description: In order to ensure the available talent pool can be scaled upwards to satisfy the Doctor's emergency preparation request, this batch of headhunting items carries specificity, time-sensitivity, and of course, a degree of risk.
LIMITED_TKT_GACHA_10_903.usage: A batch headhunting permit issued by the Rhodes Island HR Department; Can be used at a certain time to recruit talented Operators, 10 rolls at once.

7003.name: Headhunting Permit
7003.description: Compared to Rhodes Island, headhunting companies have more contacts and resources. They are probably more capable of finding skilled operators in all fields, which is why the Human Resource Department is willing to pay their exorbitant commissions.
7003.usage: A permit issued by the Human Resource Department of Rhodes Island. Can be used to recruit an Operator through headhunting companies.

7001.name: Recruitment Permit
7001.description: Our colleagues in the Human Resource Department have to manage a deluge of information each and every day, but they always manage to dig out Rhodes Island's diamonds from the rough.
7001.usage: A permit issued by the Human Resource Department of Rhodes Island. Can be used to recruit an Operator through public channels.

7002.name: Expedited Plan
7002.description: Anyone who receives this permit, please report to the Rhodes Island Human Resource Department immediately!
7002.usage: An expedited permit issued by the Human Resource Department of Rhodes Island. Can be used to recruit an Operator through special channels.

voucher_item_4pick1.name: Operator Voucher
voucher_item_4pick1.description: Allows you to select one of the following four Operators: Silence, Liskarm, Pramanix, Projekt Red.

voucher_item_4pick1_1803.name: Operator Voucher
voucher_item_4pick1_1803.description: Allows you to select one of the following four Operators: Silence, Liskarm, Pramanix, Projekt Red.

voucher_recruitR5_pick2.name: Vulcan and Indra Recruitment Voucher
voucher_recruitR5_pick2.description: Allows you to select between one of the 5-star Recruitment-exclusive Operators: Indra and Vulcan.

voucher_recruitR5_pick1803.name: Senior Operator Transfer Permit
voucher_recruitR5_pick1803.description: Allows you to select a 5-star Operator.
voucher_recruitR5_pick1803.usage: A lot of tablework went into this Senior Operator Transfer Permit from Rhodes Island's HR distribution; a 100% guarantee on the aid you receive is no small ask.

voucher_item_pick601.name: Top Operator Transfer Permit
voucher_item_pick601.description: Allows you to select a 6-star Operator from a past Headhunting Pool up to and including 'Enthusiasm, Expansion, Explosion.'
voucher_item_pick601.usage: A lot of tablework went into this Top Operator Transfer Permit from Rhodes Island's HR distribution; a 100% guarantee on the aid you receive is no small ask.

voucher_item_pick1401.name: Thank-You Celebration Operator Permit
voucher_item_pick1401.description: Allows you to select a non-limited 6-star Operator from a past Headhunting Pool up to and including 'Illusions of the Past.'
voucher_item_pick1401.usage: A lot of tablework went into this Top Operator Transfer Permit from Rhodes Island's HR distribution; a 100% guarantee on the aid you receive is no small ask.

voucher_item_pick1803.name: Top Operator Transfer Permit

voucher_item_pick1803.usage: A lot of tablework went into this Top Operator Transfer Permit from Rhodes Island's HR distribution; a 100% guarantee on the aid you receive is no small ask.

voucher_recruitR5_pick2701.description: Allows you to select a 5-star Operator from a past Headhunting Pool up to and including 'Erg Passenger.'
voucher_recruitR5_pick2701.usage: A lot of tablework went into this Senior Operator Transfer Permit from Rhodes Island's HR distribution; a 100% guarantee on the aid you receive is no small ask.

voucher_elite_II_5.name: Senior Operator Training Invitation Letter
voucher_elite_II_5.description: Operators holding this letter are able to apply for short-term rush training; the Instructors will tailor the course according to the Operator's circumstances, helping them make rapid breakthroughs, unearth their own potential, and attain a decisive standard.
voucher_elite_II_5.usage: A training invitation exclusive to Senior Operators, offering accelerated promotion of their abilities to the Elite 2 level.

voucher_skin.name: Outfit Voucher
voucher_skin.description: Can be exchanged for an outfit currently being sold at the Outfit Store that matches the exchange conditions.
voucher_skin.usage: An Operator outfit voucher from Rhodes Island's HR distribution; a new set of clothes always makes people happy.

2020recruitment10_1.name: Type-α Headhunting Permit
2020recruitment10_1.description: Due to various strategic considerations, Rhodes Island conducted targeted headhunting in addition to batch recruitment in order to seek assistance from individuals with special talents.
2020recruitment10_1.usage: A special permit issued by the Rhodes Island HR Department with specific instructions for the headhunting agency. Can be used to headhunt for 10 Operators.

2020recruitment10_2.description: Due to various strategic considerations, Rhodes Island conducted targeted headhunting in addition to batch recruitment in order to seek assistance from individuals with special talents.
2020recruitment10_2.usage: A special permit issued by the Rhodes Island HR Department with specific instructions for the headhunting agency. Can be used to headhunt for 10 Operators.

2020recruitment10_3.name: Type-γ Headhunting Permit
2020recruitment10_3.description: Due to various strategic considerations, Rhodes Island conducted targeted headhunting in addition to batch recruitment in order to seek assistance from individuals with special talents.

voucher_recruitR4_1.name: ★4 Recruitment Voucher I
voucher_recruitR4_1.description: Allows you to select one of the 4-star Operators available during the first Recruitment period.

voucher_recruitR3_1.name: ★3 Recruitment Voucher I
voucher_recruitR3_1.description: Allows you to select one of the 3-star Operators available during the first Recruitment period.

voucher_chipPack.name: Automatic Chip Pack Printer
voucher_chipPack.description: In the process of product iteration, difficulties arise one after another. And the most crucial of all is... the lack of training data.
voucher_chipPack.usage: A single-use automatic device that can print any pre-compiled training records and relevant materials. With a single button, it prints any desired chip pack.

voucher_chip.name: Automatic Chip Printer
voucher_chip.description: A single-use device developed to tackle the problem of redundant training data. The next challenge would be improving its data conversion rate and developing a recovery function.
voucher_chip.usage: A single-use automatic device that can print any pre-compiled training records and relevant materials. With a single button, it prints any desired chip.

randomMaterialRune_0.description: A supply crate from the Contingency Contract network. Provides a bit of a reward to those who work hard to heal this land. -Contingency Contract
randomMaterialRune_0.usage: Filled with an assortment of supplies and materials.

randomMaterial_1.name: Rhodes Island Supplies
randomMaterial_1.description: Rhodes Island purchases and stores boxes of supplies from various places. However, due to the lack of an organized storage system, each box contains seemingly random materials.
randomMaterial_1.usage: Filled with an assortment of supplies and materials.
randomMaterial_1.obtainApproach: Obtained through event stage limited-time drop or event

randomMaterial_2.name: New Year's Lantern
randomMaterial_2.description: Lanterns hung up during the passing of the old year and the arrival of the new. Within them are recent memories, puzzles and riddles, and even tales from the distant past.
randomMaterial_2.usage: A collection of supplies and materials collected through the New Year.

randomMaterial_3.name: 32-hour Strategic Ration
randomMaterial_3.description: A pack of rations containing various resources and supplies. In more ways than one, its appearance provides glimpses into the battle that transpired in the heart of Chernobog. Even looking at it now fills one's heart with a lingering dread.
randomMaterial_3.usage: A pack of rations, containing a variety of random supplies.

randomMaterial_4.name: Thank-You Celebration Supplies
randomMaterial_4.description: Rhodes Island purchases and stores boxes of supplies from various places. However, due to the lack of an organized storage system, each box contains seemingly random materials.
randomMaterial_4.usage: Filled with an assortment of supplies and materials.

randomMaterial_5.name: Rhodes Island Supplies II
randomMaterial_5.description: Rhodes Island purchases and stores boxes of supplies from various places. However, due to the lack of an organized storage system, each box contains seemingly random materials.
randomMaterial_5.usage: Filled with an assortment of supplies and materials.

randomMaterial_6.description: Rhodes Island purchases and stores boxes of supplies from various places. However, due to the lack of an organized storage system, each box contains seemingly random materials.
randomMaterial_6.usage: Filled with an assortment of supplies and materials.

randomMaterial_7.name: Rhodes Island Supplies IV
randomMaterial_7.description: Rhodes Island purchases and stores boxes of supplies from various places. However, due to the lack of an organized storage system, each box contains seemingly random materials.
randomMaterial_7.usage: Filled with an assortment of supplies and materials.

randomDiamondShd_1.name: Half Year Anniversary Red Envelope
randomDiamondShd_1.description: Nobody knows who ended up footing the bill. What we do know is the hope they have for Rhodes Island.
randomDiamondShd_1.usage: Red envelopes passed out to every member of Rhodes Island. The goods inside may be random, but they are always filled to the brim with blessings.

randomDiamondShd_2.name: Celebratory Box
randomDiamondShd_2.description: Nobody knows who ended up footing the bill. What we do know is the hope they have for Rhodes Island.
randomDiamondShd_2.usage: Gift boxes distributed to all members of Rhodes Island, random in amount, and full of the joy that comes with celebration.

2001.name: Drill Battle Record
2001.description:
In such a hostile environment, every operation has the potential for a loss of life. We may be able to save more people if we are well prepared.
A video record of several battles.
2001.usage: A device that stores battle videos. Gives Operators a slight amount of EXP.

2002.name: Frontline Battle Record
2002.description:
In such a hostile environment, every operation has the potential for a loss of life. We may be able to save more people if we are well prepared.
A video record of several battles, with detailed statistical analysis, plus 3 hours of additional materials and interviews.
2002.usage: A device that stores battle videos. Gives Operators a moderate amount of EXP.

2003.name: Tactical Battle Record
2003.description:
In such a hostile environment, every operation has the potential for a loss of life. We may be able to save more people if we are well prepared.
A video record of several battles, plus the signature of the one who recorded them.
2003.usage: A device that stores battle videos. Gives Operators a significant amount of EXP.

2004.name: Strategic Battle Record
2004.description:
In such a hostile environment, every operation has the potential for a loss of life. We may be able to save more people if we are well prepared.
Comes with a collector's edition, a HD version, an HD remastered version, an Enhanced edition, a Director's cut edition, an Annual Gold edition...
2004.usage: A device that stores battle videos. Gives Operators a huge amount of EXP.

3301.name: Skill Summary - 1
3301.description: It records entry-level skills needed by Operators. Even a dummy could master the techniques after a bit of study.
3301.usage: A book that records basic tactics. Can be used to upgrade Operator skills.

3302.name: Skill Summary - 2
3302.description: It records junior skills needed by Operators. It takes some time and effort to master them.
3302.usage: A book that records intermediate tactics. Can be used to upgrade Operator skills.

3303.name: Skill Summary - 3
3303.description: It records high level skills needed by Operators. It takes a depth of experience in relevant fields to understand them.
3303.usage: A book that records advanced tactics. Can be used to upgrade Operator skills.

mod_unlock_token.name: Module Data Block
mod_unlock_token.description: The data blocks record the endless nights the Engineering Department toiled away developing the various modules.

mod_update_token_2.name: Data Supplement Instrument
mod_update_token_2.description:
Experience is abstracted into data, and the data become a weapon. All true warriors must come to know both themselves and the battlefield.
The crystallization of the entire Engineering Department's blood, sweat, and tears. Once further upgraded, the modules will help optimize our Operators' combat styles and vastly improve their abilities.

mod_update_token_1.name: Data Supplement Stick
mod_update_token_1.description:
Experience is abstracted into data, and the data become a weapon. All true warriors must come to know both themselves and the battlefield.
The crystallization of the entire Engineering Department's blood, sweat, and tears. Once upgraded, the modules will greatly improve our Operators' combat abilities.

30051.name: Diketon
30051.description: A very small amount of Diketon. After reprocessing, Engineer Operators use solidification during chemical combination to bond other stable structures.
30051.usage: A very small amount of industrial organic compound. Can be used for a variety of upgrades and for production in the Factory.

30052.name: Polyketon
30052.description: A small amount of Polyketon preparation produced through a special process. Its closed molecular structure has changed much complicated processing into simple chemical reactions. Of course, certain technical support is still needed.
30052.usage: A small amount of industrial organic compound. Can be used for a variety of upgrades and for production in the Factory.

30053.name: Aketon
30053.description: A modest amount of Aketon preparation produced through further dehydrocarbon processing. The preparation reacts with the non-oxygen molecules in the air, so Engineer Operators must be careful during processing to avoid waste.
30053.usage: A modest amount of industrial organic compound. Can be used for a variety of upgrades and for production in the Factory.

30054.name: Keton Colloid
30054.description: A large amount of unstable Keton preparation. As one of the advanced industrial materials, it is closely monitored by our Engineer Operators. Please be careful when handling.
30054.usage: A large amount of industrial organic compound. Can be used for a variety of upgrades and the synthesis of Polymerization Preparation.

30041.name: Oriron Shard
30041.description: A byproduct of massive metal processing. Its high plasticity and oxidation resistance make it a common material of smelting and phased processing.
30041.usage: A common industrial material. Can be used for a variety of upgrades and for production in the Factory.

30042.name: Oriron
30042.description: In a small number of inerting processes, Oriron Shards may have phase changed and polymerized into Oriron. It is generally thought that Oriron is relatively stable when it reaches this level.
30042.usage: A rare industrial material. Can be used for a variety of upgrades and for production in the Factory.

30043.name: Oriron Cluster
30043.description: During the processing, influenced by very few unartificial factors, multiple Orirons may merge into this form by chance. Its hardness has decreased but its purity has increased.
30043.usage: A precious industrial material. Can be used for a variety of upgrades and for production in the Factory.

30044.name: Oriron Block
30044.description: An Oriron block fused with multiple Oriron Clusters under extremely harsh conditions. As the most stable and rarest form of Oriron, it can be used in all manners of industrial production.
30044.usage: An expensive industrial material. Can be used for a variety of upgrades and the synthesis of Polymerization Preparation.

30021.name: Sugar Substitute
30021.description: It's slightly sweet and possibly edible. It is also commonly used in chemical manufacturing.
30021.usage: Cheap sugar substitute produced by assembly line. Can be used for a variety of upgrades and for production in the Factory.

30022.name: Sugar
30022.description: A more expensive sugar made from natural materials. Ahh, this taste... will surely put one in a great mood. However, it's not for casual snacking.
30022.usage: A small amount of sugar produced by assembly line. Can be used for a variety of upgrades and for production in the Factory.

30023.name: Sugar Pack
30023.description: A calorie-rich sugar pack that's highly sought after. Its weight never seems to meet the standards set for chemical manufacturing. The production line employees may have something to do with it.
30023.usage: A decent amount of sugar produced by assembly line. Can be used for a variety of upgrades and for production in the Factory.

30024.name: Sugar Lump
30024.description: A nice, finely processed sugar lump commonly used for potion production. Do not taste test it! This is not food and is not to be sold as food! EVER!
30024.usage: A large amount of sugar produced by assembly line. Can be used for a variety of upgrades and for production in the Factory.

30031.name: Ester
30031.description: One of the most important materials in modern industry. Its appearance has lead to the development of many modern products. This one, of course, is only a raw material that has practical application.
30031.usage: Ester used in industrial production. Can be used for a variety of upgrades and for production in the Factory.

30032.name: Polyester
30032.description: Although its is lacking in potency, it can still be used to produce some basic materials we need. It is also a common ingredient in some sustained-release drugs.
30032.usage: A small amount of polyester used in industrial production. Can be used for a variety of upgrades and for production in the Factory.

30033.name: Polyester Pack
30033.description: After a series of processes, it meets the standards and general needs of most products on the market. It can also be used to process some special materials.
30033.usage: A pack of polyester used in industrial production. Can be used for a variety of upgrades and for production in the Factory.

30034.name: Polyester Lump
30034.description: A refined material. As a product, it is mostly sold to organizations and research institutions that have extremely high raw material needs. It may become the basis of the next generation of materials.
30034.usage: A lump of polyester used in industrial production. Can be used for a variety of upgrades and for production in the Factory.

30061.name: Damaged Device
30061.description: A broken device that was embedded in the enemy's weapons and armor. It got damaged during a fierce fight, but the components inside are still valuable.
30061.usage: A damaged mechanical device captured from Reunion. Can be used for a variety of upgrades and for production in the Factory.

30062.name: Device
30062.description: A set of devices that are relatively complete with numerous valuable components. To make it portable and practical, almost every bit of space around the motherboard is in use.
30062.usage: An ordinary mechanical device captured from Reunion. Can be used for a variety of upgrades and for production in the Factory.

30063.name: Integrated Device
30063.description: A set of brand new devices. By reproducing the structure of devices of the same type, the lack of space around the motherboard has been solved. The energy consumption, of course, has also become higher.
30063.usage: A brand new mechanical device captured from Reunion. Can be used for a variety of upgrades and for production in the Factory.

30064.name: Optimized Device
30064.description: After undergoing a large number of private modifications, these devices have greatly expanded capacity, which improves performance at the cost of stability. From this, one can feel the dedication and perseverance from the makers.
30064.usage: An advanced mechanical device captured from Reunion. Can be used for a variety of upgrades and the synthesis of Bipolar Nanoflake.

30011.name: Orirock
30011.description: Rich in organics, it is commonly seen in regions where Originium has completely volatilized. Compared to Originium, it is easier to exploit.
30011.usage: A rock mined from the ground. Can be used for a variety of upgrades and for production in the Factory.

30012.name: Orirock Cube
30012.description: With numerous micropores, it is often used in the interlayer of armors as an adsorbent of the breakdown product of Originium gas.
30012.usage: A rock cube mined from the ground. Can be used for a variety of upgrades and for production in the Factory.

30013.name: Orirock Cluster
30013.description: Compressed from Orirock Cubes, it can be formed naturally. It is a fragile material, but industrial technology has made it possible to produce complete Orirock Clusters now. People often mistake it for an ordinary cluster of rocks.
30013.usage: A conglomerate rock mined from the ground. Can be used for a variety of upgrades and for production in the Factory.

30014.name: Orirock Concentration
30014.description: This Orirock looks different from the raw material after the refinement process. It costs much more than other processing methods. Anyone who has seen the smooth cutting surface will be amazed. That must be the charm of combining nature with industry.
30014.usage: A refined matter produced with Orirock Cluster. Can be used for a variety of upgrades and the synthesis of Polymerization Preparation.

30103.name: RMA70-12
30103.description: A mineral whose natural form is a complicated polyhedron. Its value for Originium Arts was known long before its industrial value.
30103.usage: A sensitive mineral with high conductivity. Can be used for a variety of upgrades and for production in the Factory.

30104.name: RMA70-24
30104.description: A mineral whose natural form is a complicated polyhedron. Found in 1024, it shows great industrial value that other minerals used for Originium Arts lack.
30104.usage: A highly sensitive mineral with outstanding conductivity. Can be used for a variety of upgrades and the synthesis of D32 Steel.

30093.name: Grindstone
30093.description: An important tool in component processing. It has stable properties, and will never explode, powderize, or crack.
30093.usage: A grindstone used to process weapon parts. Can be used for a variety of upgrades and for production in the Factory.

30094.name: Grindstone Pentahydrate
30094.description: Compared to normal Grindstone, this tool has an even more stable structure. It is highly non-reactive.
30094.usage: An advanced grindstone used in the finish machining of weapon parts. Can be used for a variety of upgrades and the synthesis of D32 Steel.

30083.name: Manganese Ore
30083.description: A metal that is used to produce a catalyst widely used in industries. As the reprocessing is complicated, accidents caused by nonstandard techniques do happen from time to time.
30083.usage: A metal ore used for metallurgy. Can be used for a variety of upgrades and for production in the Factory.

30084.name: Manganese Trihydrate
30084.description: A precious metal which few companies are willing to use to produce industrial catalysts. The catalyst made from it, however, has an extremely long service life. It can be used repeatedly and even stripped and recycled, but the complicated processes have forced many companies to give up.
30084.usage: A metal ore used for metallurgy. Can be used for a variety of upgrades and the synthesis of D32 Steel.

30073.name: Loxic Kohl
30073.description: An outstanding chemical mediator. When in use, it often changes between two forms to store and release other materials. When it becomes liquid, some of its properties are the same as those of alcohol, which often leaves our Engineer Operators tipsy.
30073.usage: A flaky organic compound. Can be used for a variety of upgrades and for production in the Factory.

30074.name: White Horse Kohl
30074.description: A product made from Loxic Kohl after fine processing. It was named after the company that discovered its production method. Experiments show that it tends to transform to a higher structure in abnormal environments.
30074.usage: A flaky organic compound. Can be used for a variety of upgrades and the synthesis of Bipolar Nanoflake.

31013.name: Coagulating Gel
31013.description: An artificial material serendipitously born in the laboratory. It has excellent resistance to extreme temperatures, is lightweight, and is easy to process, making it ideal for use in high-tech projects.
31013.usage: A high-strength plastic material suitable. Can be used for a variety of upgrades and for synthesis projects in Factories.

31014.name: Polymerized Gel
31014.description: An artificial material created from a large number of experiments using coagulating gel as a base material. It can maintain its stability even in high-pressure environments, playing a key role in some high-tech projects.
31014.usage: An extremely high-strength plastic material. Can be used for a variety of upgrades.

31023.name: Incandescent Alloy
31023.description: An alloy smelted from several rare Terran metals. Used to manufacture rare electronic components and circuit boards, it has become an indispensable material in the cutting-edge electronics industry.
31023.usage: A special alloy with a high melting point, commonly used in the electronics industry. Can be used for a variety of upgrades and for synthesis projects in Factories.

31024.name: Incandescent Alloy Block
31024.description: A product derived from further processing of incandescent alloy. After complicated industrial processing, the stability of its solid-liquid hybridization state at certain temperatures has been preserved. As a result, it has an irreplaceable role in product development in the cutting-edge electronics industry.
31024.usage: A rarely-produced alloy with a high melting point, commonly used in the electronics industry. Can be used for a variety of upgrades.

31033.name: Crystalline Component
31033.description: A raw industrial material made with the outer shell of an Originium crystal. A fundamental product in the modern Originium electronics industry.
31033.usage: An important Originium industry material. Can be used for a variety of upgrades. Can be manufactured and assembled into more advanced Originium electric components.

31034.name: Crystalline Circuit
31034.description: A core product in the modern Originium electronics industry. Found inside electronic goods far and wide throughout Terra's nations. The mass application of crystalline circuitry is one more reminder of Terra's industrial modernization.
31034.usage: An important Originium industry material. Can be used for a variety of upgrades. A fundamental part of manufacturing Originium crystal assemblies.

31043.name: Semi-Synthetic Solvent
31043.description: The product of a traditional solvent undergoing a modernization process, it demonstrates remarkably enhanced properties.
31043.usage: An active solvent with excellent physical characteristics, and good resistance to acids and bases. Can be used in a variety of upgrades.

31044.name: Refined Solvent
31044.description: A coating held together by high-molecule polymers. In addition to its baseline protective capabilities, it has also gained other special characteristics, of which heat resistance is but one of many.
31044.usage: A special coating made from a specific formulation process. Can be used for high level upgrades.

31053.name: Compound Cutting Fluid
31053.description: Provides lubrication and heat resistance during the refining process, which can further increase the rate at which metal products meet final quality specifications.
31053.usage: An industrial agent necessary for metal processing. Can be used for a variety of upgrades.

31054.name: Cutting Fluid Solution
31054.description: A biologically stable stock solution. Precautions should be taken to avoid cross-contamination during storage.
31054.usage: A stock solution prepared from a variety of active solvents. Can be used for high level upgrades.

31063.name: Transmuted Salt
31063.description: The surface of this material has mutable characteristics, realizing results that were originally nearly impossible. CAUTION: industrial salt is not to be eaten under any circumstances.
31063.usage: A compound crystallization that has undergone low-tolerance refinement. Can be used in a variety of strengthening projects.

31064.name: Transmuted Salt Agglomerate
31064.description: A stable crystalline body, manufactured as a crystal blend within saturated solutions. Can provide materials with a diverse array of capabilities.
31064.usage: A compound crystal mass that has undergone high-tolerance refinement. Used in a variety of strengthening projects, and is a common material in synthetic items at factories.

30115.name: Polymerization Preparation
30115.description: A material commonly used as an isolation coating for delicate equipment. Its bonding effect is strong enough to interrupt the volatilization of Originium.
30115.usage: A complicated liquid industrial product. Can be used for high level upgrades.

30125.name: Bipolar Nanoflake
30125.description: A device that is sensitive to Originium within a certain range. It can significantly improve the sensitivity of nearby weapons and equipment to Originium, making them near vessels for Originium Arts.
30125.usage: The brainchild of modern science and industry. Can be used for high level upgrades.

30135.name: D32 Steel
30135.description: This material can deliver Originium Arts smoothly and its amazing hardness makes it impossible to penetrate. It will set a new standard for weapon materials.
30135.usage: An artificial metal that doesn't exist in nature. Can be used for high level upgrades.

30145.name: Crystalline Electronic Unit
30145.description: A crystallization of Terra's Originium technology. A symbol of Terra's industrial modernization. From Originium Casting units to intercity network servers, their making all starts with inventions like these.
30145.usage: An expensive Originium industry product. Can be used for major upgrades.

30155.name: Nucleic Crystal Sinter
30155.description: A material that possesses a molecular recognitive capacity under specific high-temperature conditions. Can selectively adsorb Originium when used as a reagent, allowing for precise handling of Originium materials, lower Originium device energy consumption, and the opening of further new possibilities.
30155.usage: A product of modern technology that requires the ultimate in industrial craft. Used in advanced strengthening projects.

3105.name: Keel
3105.description: The foundation of the entire construction operation at Rhodes Island. Although this giant, complicated component must be custom made or ordered, for some reason, Rhodes Island often uses it to build special facilities.
3105.usage: A delicate artificial component used as the core material of Base construction.
3105.obtainApproach: Dropped from the first clear of 1-1, 1-8, 3-4 and 4-7

3401.name: Furniture Part
3401.description: Table legs, chair arms, cushions, we have everything here. Put them together and you get a nice piece of furniture.

3131.name: Light Building Material
3131.description: Room modification causes irreversible damage to load bearing parts if not handled properly. Please use building materials before commencing modification in order to guarantee the integrity of the room.
3131.usage: A basic construction material used for the facility development of Rhodes Island.
3131.obtainApproach: Dropped from the first clear of 0-11, 1-1

3132.name: Concrete Building Material
3132.description: Before conducting modifications to rooms with poor structural integrity, please use this building material for maintenance to ensure the safety of the work site. Only then will you be ready to begin.
3132.usage: A strengthened construction material used for the facility development of Rhodes Island.

3133.name: Reinforced Building Material
3133.description: Please do not waste time with stress tests on rooms strengthened by this material! None of the currently employed demolition methods can damage the structural integrity of these rooms, but they may be dangerous to the experimenters.
3133.usage: An advanced construction material used for the facility development of Rhodes Island.

3112.name: Carbon Stick
3112.description: One of the necessary industrial materials, it can be used to produce a variety of polymers.
3112.usage: A carbon stick used for the facility development of Rhodes Island.

3113.name: Carbon Brick
3113.description: Light and highly pure, it possesses excellent workability, and is instrumental to the success of our operations.
3113.usage: A carbon brick used for the facility development of Rhodes Island.

3114.name: Carbon Pack
3114.description: A large number of carbon bricks. Every one of them has a burning soul for modern industry.
3114.usage: A pack of carbon bricks used for the facility development of Rhodes Island.

32001.name: Chip Catalyst
32001.description: It's highly valuable, but its low yield has been a problem for Engineer Operators.
