p_char_285_medic2.description: A first aid spray kit whose box has a label 'Effective Immediately.' It can be added to medical equipment or used directly.
p_char_285_medic2.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Lancet-2.

p_char_286_cast3.name: Castle-3's Token
p_char_286_cast3.description: A hard, portable armor piece without an instruction manual.
p_char_286_cast3.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Castle-3.

p_char_376_therex.name: THRM-EX's Token
p_char_376_therex.description: A luminous heat storage core; The following is imprinted on the package in bold, black letters: 'FEEL THE PASSION!'
p_char_376_therex.usage: Used to improve the Potential of THRM-EX.

p_char_4000_jnight.name: Justice Knight's Token
p_char_4000_jnight.description: The flag of 'Justice Knight.' When it's time for its regular switch-out and cleaning, be kind and lend her a hand.
p_char_4000_jnight.usage: Used to improve the Potential of 'Justice Knight.'

p_char_502_nblade.name: Yato's Token
p_char_502_nblade.description: A yellowing, incomplete book that lies in a lacquer box. It records the most challenging skill of swordsmanship: inner peace.
p_char_502_nblade.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Yato.

p_char_500_noirc.name: Noir Corne's Token
p_char_500_noirc.description: A timeworn mask used during sacrificial festivals. The hollow eye sockets bore witness to the birth of the land.
p_char_500_noirc.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Noir Corne.

p_char_503_rang.name: Rangers' Token
p_char_503_rang.description: Two pieces of flint strung together. It was from these small things that civilization was born.
p_char_503_rang.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Rangers.

p_char_501_durin.name: Durin's Token
p_char_501_durin.description: A small Originium product made by a Durinese craftsman. Hold it tightly for a while and you will suddenly feel full of energy.
p_char_501_durin.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Durin.

p_char_009_12fce.name: 12F's Token
p_char_009_12fce.description: A piece of chocolate wrapped in old packaging. The words 'Merry Christmas' are written on the back, barely legible.
p_char_009_12fce.usage: Used to improve the Potential of 12F.

p_char_123_fang.name: Fang's Token
p_char_123_fang.description: A pair of running shoes that fit your feet perfectly. The person who gave you this must have spent a lot of effort asking you to join her on her morning exercise routine.
p_char_123_fang.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Fang.

p_char_240_wyvern.name: Vanilla's Token
p_char_240_wyvern.description: A wild animal map of the Vouivre Boundary Grassland. The marks on it are disappearing one after another as the engines of mobile cities roar.
p_char_240_wyvern.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Vanilla.

p_char_192_falco.name: Plume's Token
p_char_192_falco.description: A formal hat decorated with a modest amount of feathers. It is suitable for all Laterano festivals.
p_char_192_falco.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Plume.

p_char_208_melan.name: Melantha's Token
p_char_208_melan.description: Simply wrapped candles. The special fragrance they emit is unforgettable.
p_char_208_melan.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Melantha.

p_char_209_ardign.name: Cardigan's Token
p_char_209_ardign.description: A sled made of hard wood. It makes you look forward to seeing snow.
p_char_209_ardign.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Cardigan.

p_char_122_beagle.name: Beagle's Token
p_char_122_beagle.description: Transcripts neatly placed inside a folder. They all show straight A's.
p_char_122_beagle.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Beagle.

p_char_124_kroos.name: Kroos's Token
p_char_124_kroos.description: A collection of shooting toys, including a plastic bow, several sucker arrows and an apple to be used as a target.
p_char_124_kroos.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Kroos.

p_char_211_adnach.name: Adnachiel's Token
p_char_211_adnach.description: A furry hat that won't fit on a Sankta's head.
p_char_211_adnach.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Adnachiel.

p_char_121_lava.name: Lava's Token
p_char_121_lava.description: A specially processed sheath. It is covered in deliberately mysterious patterns.
p_char_121_lava.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Lava.

p_char_120_hibisc.name: Hibiscus's Token
p_char_120_hibisc.description: A daily schedule custom made for your own healthy living. To be honest, it's hard to reject it.
p_char_120_hibisc.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Hibiscus.

p_char_212_ansel.name: Ansel's Token
p_char_212_ansel.description: A portable blood pressure meter. Hope you can take good care of yourself even without a medic around.
p_char_212_ansel.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Ansel.

p_char_210_stward.name: Steward's Token
p_char_210_stward.description: A trendy sport armlet. Looks like it's a simple version with only one color.
p_char_210_stward.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Steward.

p_char_278_orchid.name: Orchid's Token
p_char_278_orchid.description: A delicate pen that has been lovingly packaged. It feels like working in a office building when you use it to review documents.
p_char_278_orchid.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Orchid.

p_char_282_catap.name: Catapult's Token
p_char_282_catap.description: A nameplate worn only by soldiers. Now that she is free, she has handed over her glory to you.
p_char_282_catap.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Catapult.

p_char_283_midn.name: Midnight's Token
p_char_283_midn.description: A delicate goblet. Under the yellow light, it gives off intoxicating colors.
p_char_283_midn.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Midnight.

p_char_284_spot.name: Spot's Token
p_char_284_spot.description: A slang dictionary. It tells how to be gently sarcastic in the languages of several countries.
p_char_284_spot.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Spot.

p_char_281_popka.name: Popukar's Token
p_char_281_popka.description: A solid metal toy. It's particularly heavy and hard to destroy.
p_char_281_popka.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Popukar.

p_char_141_nights.name: Haze's Token
p_char_141_nights.description: A serving spoon. Its companion fork has been hidden inside a book.
p_char_141_nights.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Haze.

p_char_109_fmout.name: Gitano's Token
p_char_109_fmout.description: A card from a divination deck. Although you already know its meaning, you make your own future.
p_char_109_fmout.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Gitano.

p_char_235_jesica.name: Jessica's Token
p_char_235_jesica.description: A photo commemorating Jessica's entry into Blacksteel. It represents the start of a new life.
p_char_235_jesica.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Jessica.

p_char_126_shotst.name: Meteor's Token
p_char_126_shotst.description: A garland made of twigs that seem to never wither. The forest of Kazimierz is asking in a low voice when its guardian will return.
p_char_126_shotst.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Meteor.

p_char_118_yuki.name: Shirayuki's Token
p_char_118_yuki.description: A calligraphic work whose ink has not yet dried. It's a blessing for Rhodes Island.
p_char_118_yuki.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Shirayuki.

p_char_198_blackd.name: Courier's Token
p_char_198_blackd.description: A bottle of malt liquor found somewhere far away. Under the sunlight, the golden liquid shines inside the glass bottle.
p_char_198_blackd.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Courier.

p_char_149_scave.name: Scavenger's Token
p_char_149_scave.description: A silver coin. Maybe you can use it to decide something important.
p_char_149_scave.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Scavenger.

p_char_290_vigna.name: Vigna's Token
p_char_290_vigna.description: An electric guitar for daily practice. A request to take it onto the battlefield was denied.
p_char_290_vigna.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Vigna.

p_char_130_doberm.name: Dobermann's Token
p_char_130_doberm.description: A red pamphlet. It records a tough battle.
p_char_130_doberm.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Dobermann.

p_char_289_gyuki.name: Matoimaru's Token
p_char_289_gyuki.description: A pair of soft blinders. It's nice to put it on at bedtime.
p_char_289_gyuki.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Matoimaru.

p_char_193_frostl.name: Frostleaf's Token
p_char_193_frostl.description: A vocabulary book that looks timeworn due to overuse. Detailed marks that look like doodles fill the margins of every page.
p_char_193_frostl.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Frostleaf.

p_char_127_estell.name: Estelle's Token
p_char_127_estell.description: A stone comb. It feels cool and emits a slight flowery fragrance.
p_char_127_estell.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Estelle.

p_char_185_frncat.name: Mousse's Token
p_char_185_frncat.description: An album whose cover is decorated with golden floral patterns. The photos inside record the 'kitties' that played with the photographer. Kitties!
p_char_185_frncat.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Mousse.

p_char_237_gravel.name: Gravel's Token
p_char_237_gravel.description: A badly worn Kazimierz knight badge. No matter what happened in the past, seizing the here and now is what really matters.
p_char_237_gravel.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Gravel.

p_char_236_rope.name: Rope's Token
p_char_236_rope.description: An expensive ornament whose price tag is still on it. Is it really okay to take it...?
p_char_236_rope.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Rope.

p_char_117_myrrh.name: Myrrh's Token
p_char_117_myrrh.description: A pill made from multiple herbs. It will come in handy when you fall ill. Besides, every pill is carefully coated.
p_char_117_myrrh.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Myrrh.

p_char_187_ccheal.name: Gavial's Token
p_char_187_ccheal.description: A set of massage tools. They help manage the tiredness from those weird healing Arts.
p_char_187_ccheal.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Gavial.

p_char_181_flower.name: Perfumer's Token
p_char_181_flower.description: A double ear vase in the style of the Minos civilization. The owner must regularly replace the old flowers with new ones.
p_char_181_flower.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Perfumer.

p_char_199_yak.name: Matterhorn's Token
p_char_199_yak.description: A wooden statue that looks a bit rough. It is lowering its head, which gives a peaceful impression.
p_char_199_yak.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Matterhorn.

p_char_150_snakek.name: Cuora's Token
p_char_150_snakek.description: A normal baseball bat bearing the illegible autographs of several famous players on it. Maybe, perhaps, those signatures are fake, but the desire to share them is real.
p_char_150_snakek.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Cuora.

p_char_196_sunbr.name: Gummy's Token
p_char_196_sunbr.description: A discount coupon for Gummy's Breakfast Kitchen. Does -100% mean it's free...?
p_char_196_sunbr.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Gummy.

p_char_110_deepcl.name: Deepcolor's Token
p_char_110_deepcl.description: A freehand fairy tale storybook. The main character, after traveling between life and death, finally steps into the river at the end.
p_char_110_deepcl.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Deepcolor.

p_char_183_skgoat.name: Earthspirit's Token
p_char_183_skgoat.description: A small piece of weirdly-shaped ore. Put it beside your ear to hear the low sounds of a liquid.
p_char_183_skgoat.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Earthspirit.

p_char_277_sqrrel.name: Shaw's Token
p_char_277_sqrrel.description: A stamp album. In the past, the owner never let anyone touch her precious collection.
p_char_277_sqrrel.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Shaw.

p_char_137_brownb.name: Beehunter's Token
p_char_137_brownb.description: A boxing trophy. The named carved on the base is already worn, but the trophy itself still emits a prideful light.
p_char_137_brownb.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Beehunter.

p_char_253_greyy.name: Greyy's Token
p_char_253_greyy.description: A delicate LED lamp. Embed 1 Originium Shard and it will shine forever. Let it dispel the anxiety brought by darkness.
p_char_253_greyy.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Greyy.

p_char_151_myrtle.name: Myrtle's Token
p_char_151_myrtle.description: A long rod that she chose herself, but it doesn't seem any different from the stick in her hand. She looks to be pretty satisfied with this gift, even though it doesn't have any particular use.
p_char_151_myrtle.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Myrtle.

p_char_298_susuro.name: Sussurro's Token
p_char_298_susuro.description: A diary made from soft paper. Whether the words record the past or the future, it will always be there as long as it's recorded, right?
p_char_298_susuro.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Sussurro.

p_char_260_durnar.name: Dur-nar's Token
p_char_260_durnar.description: An abandoned electric blade. One must first understand loss to understand what it means to treasure something.
p_char_260_durnar.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Dur-nar.

p_char_355_ethan.name: Ethan's Token
p_char_355_ethan.description: A metallic yo-yo. Be careful not to hit bystanders when playing with it.
p_char_355_ethan.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Ethan.

p_char_190_clour.name: Vermeil's Token
p_char_190_clour.description: A pearly-white string of trophies carved from animal, including one from the beast that took her arm.
p_char_190_clour.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Vermeil.

p_char_133_mm.name: May's Token
p_char_133_mm.description: It's not clear where this taser came from. It can be grouped with May's other commonly-used weapons.
p_char_133_mm.usage: Used to improve the Potential of May.

p_char_302_glaze.name: Ambriel's Token
p_char_302_glaze.description: A mirror with exquisite craftsmanship. It is easy to carry, letting you make sure that your hair isn't getting messed up in the heat of battle.
p_char_302_glaze.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Ambriel.

p_char_385_finlpp.name: Purestream's Token
p_char_385_finlpp.description: A small bottle of fresh water taken from her hometown that can be worn as decoration. Take it with you - Purestream will be glad to share a portion of her hometown with you.
p_char_385_finlpp.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Purestream.

p_char_337_utage.name: Utage's Token
p_char_337_utage.description: A black box. Inside it is another black box. Inside that is another black box. Inside that is... a manicure set?!
p_char_337_utage.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Utage.

p_char_301_cutter.name: Cutter's Token
p_char_301_cutter.description: A hand-carved talisman full of notch marks from when the maker accidentally applied too much force.
p_char_301_cutter.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Cutter.

p_char_258_podego.name: Podenco's Token
p_char_258_podego.description: A pack of flower seeds, capable of transforming your office into a flowery sanctuary. As long as you're not allergic to anything, anywhere can become the Convalescent Garden.
p_char_258_podego.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Podenco.

p_char_328_cammou.name: Click's Token
p_char_328_cammou.description: A compact disc full of popular videos produced by Click in recent years. Contains highlights and uncut content, with some entirely unedited videos.
p_char_328_cammou.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Click.

p_char_272_strong.name: Jaye's Token
p_char_272_strong.description: A kitchen knife forged from stainless steel. Probably cost quite a lot of money.
p_char_272_strong.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Jaye.

p_char_366_acdrop.name: Aciddrop's Token
p_char_366_acdrop.description: A brand new skateboard that she gifted you, along with bandages and some disinfectant.
p_char_366_acdrop.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Aciddrop.

p_char_271_spikes.name: Arene's Token
p_char_271_spikes.description: A rubber toy bullet. Sankta children keep their own toy guns and fill their pockets with these rubber bullets.
p_char_271_spikes.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Arene.

p_char_381_bubble.name: Bubble's Token
p_char_381_bubble.description: A stump dug up from outside the city. She doesn't know what to do with it either, but she thought you'd like it, so she dug it up for you.
p_char_381_bubble.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Bubble.

p_char_347_jaksel.name: Jackie's Token
p_char_347_jaksel.description: A pair of brand new sneakers. She's very, VERY looking forward to working out with you.
p_char_347_jaksel.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Jackie.

p_char_440_pinecn.name: Pinecone's Token
p_char_440_pinecn.description: A very heavy toolbag, including a back-up nailgun, many spare parts, and a small figurine she's forgotten in there.
p_char_440_pinecn.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Pinecone.

p_char_452_bstalk.name: Beanstalk's Token
p_char_452_bstalk.description: An exchange certificate for a pet Metal Crab. After the breeder pledges and stamps, and once the Beanstalk Breeding Company is officially established, this certificate can be exchanged for the adoption of an adorable baby Metal Crab.
p_char_452_bstalk.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Beanstalk.

p_char_469_indigo.name: Indigo's Token
p_char_469_indigo.description: A beautiful glowskater. Its faint light can illuminate all throughout the night. By the next day, you're free to let it go.
p_char_469_indigo.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Indigo.

p_char_484_robrta.name: Roberta's Token
p_char_484_robrta.description: A makeup brush of rough craftsmanship. Though it shows signs of age, each brown bristle is clean and very soft.
p_char_484_robrta.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Roberta.

p_char_4004_pudd.name: Pudding's Token
p_char_4004_pudd.description: A plushie named 'Pillow.' An important friend to Pudding, cleaned and maintained at a frequency far beyond the norm for the average plushie.
p_char_4004_pudd.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Pudding.

p_char_4041_chnut.name: Chestnut's Token
p_char_4041_chnut.description: Due to how hard they are to grow, this cluster of fluorescent subterranean mushrooms remains miniscule. But still, it represents home.
p_char_4041_chnut.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Chestnut.

p_char_4062_totter.name: Totter's Token
p_char_4062_totter.description: A chunk of firewood frozen absolutely solid. Needs a perfunctory baking to remove moisture content before it can be thrown in the furnace.
p_char_4062_totter.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Totter.

p_char_128_plosis.name: Ptilopsis's Token
p_char_128_plosis.description: A reference book which tells how to recognize and use Originium Arts. Most Operators don't understand it.
p_char_128_plosis.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Ptilopsis.

p_char_115_headbr.name: Zima's Token
p_char_115_headbr.description: A strip of cloth ripped from a red flag. When you tie it to your arm, you will somehow feel sad.
p_char_115_headbr.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Zima.

p_char_102_texas.name: Texas's Token
p_char_102_texas.description: The scutcheon of Texas's family. The scratch on it tells a story.
p_char_102_texas.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Texas.

p_char_106_franka.name: Franka's Token
p_char_106_franka.description: An itinerary. There are too many destinations on it so it's hard to stick to it.
p_char_106_franka.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Franka.

p_char_155_tiger.name: Indra's Token
p_char_155_tiger.description: A can of salted licorice with a long shelf life. Under that inaccessible appearance is an even more inaccessible taste.
p_char_155_tiger.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Indra.

p_char_140_whitew.name: Lappland's Token
p_char_140_whitew.description: Several bloodstained scutcheons with names on them. They represent the leaders of several gangs.
p_char_140_whitew.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Lappland.

p_char_143_ghost.name: Specter's Token
p_char_143_ghost.description: An indescribable painting. The use of negative space is confusing.
p_char_143_ghost.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Specter.

p_char_129_bluep.name: Blue Poison's Token
p_char_129_bluep.description: A shopping card from a high-class clothing shop. Put away the boring uniforms and enjoy dressing up.
p_char_129_bluep.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Blue Poison.

p_char_204_platnm.name: Platinum's Token
p_char_204_platnm.description: Two tickets to the amusement park. Let's go together this weekend.
p_char_204_platnm.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Platinum.

p_char_219_meteo.name: Meteorite's Token
p_char_219_meteo.description: A letter from the Sarkaz children you saved. They haphazardly express their gratitude to Rhodes Island.
p_char_219_meteo.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Meteorite.

p_char_002_amiya.name: Amiya's Token
p_char_002_amiya.description: 'You will understand my choice one day... Forgive me.'
p_char_002_amiya.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Amiya.

p_char_166_skfire.name: Skyfire's Token
p_char_166_skfire.description: A glass bead that feels cool. The colors inside are raging.
p_char_166_skfire.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Skyfire.

p_char_242_otter.name: Mayer's Token
p_char_242_otter.description: A mini Meeboo model. There is a red button in its belly. Hmm...
p_char_242_otter.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Mayer.

p_char_108_silent.name: Silence's Token
p_char_108_silent.description: A patterned feather decoration. This ineloquent researcher from Liberi shows her sincerity by gifting her own feathers.
p_char_108_silent.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Silence.

p_char_171_bldsk.name: Warfarin's Token
p_char_171_bldsk.description: A mysterious liquid sealed inside a small transparent bottle. Ropy and shiny, this red matter changes its form slowly as you shake the bottle.
p_char_171_bldsk.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Warfarin.

p_char_148_nearl.name: Nearl's Token
p_char_148_nearl.description: An old, discolored Kazimierz knight badge. The Pegasus made of niello is fluttering its wings.
p_char_148_nearl.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Nearl.

p_char_144_red.name: Projekt Red's Token
p_char_144_red.description: A pointed baby tooth. Hope you can take good care of it.
p_char_144_red.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Projekt Red.

p_char_107_liskam.name: Liskarm's Token
p_char_107_liskam.description: A tailor-made insulative bracelet. A safe handshake, finally.
p_char_107_liskam.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Liskarm.

p_char_201_moeshd.name: Croissant's Token
p_char_201_moeshd.description: A business card with a cute style. Different from normal ones, it has a QR code for receiving money and a remark 'Thank You!'
p_char_201_moeshd.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Croissant.

p_char_163_hpsts.name: Vulcan's Token
p_char_163_hpsts.description: A steel billet with beautiful patterns. No matter the quality of the raw materials, shaping them always requires hardening and polishing.
p_char_163_hpsts.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Vulcan.

p_char_145_prove.name: Provence's Token
p_char_145_prove.description: A multifunctional cleaning machine. Most of the time, it is used to clean the hair shed from operators' tails.
p_char_145_prove.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Provence.

p_char_158_milu.name: Firewatch's Token
p_char_158_milu.description: A simple harmonica. The moment the melodious tweedle sounds, the leaves fall like rain.
p_char_158_milu.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Firewatch.

p_char_173_slchan.name: Cliffheart's Token
p_char_173_slchan.description: A handmade rope ring. Three ropes twine around each other tightly.
p_char_173_slchan.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Cliffheart.

p_char_174_slbell.name: Pramanix's Token
p_char_174_slbell.description: A small silver bell. It emits refreshing tinkles when stroked by the breeze.
p_char_174_slbell.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Pramanix.

p_char_195_glassb.name: Istina's Token
p_char_195_glassb.description: A book on the war history of Ursus. It's said the author has been exiled to Leithanien.
p_char_195_glassb.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Istina.

p_char_101_sora.name: Sora's Token
p_char_101_sora.description: The first single CD Sora released when she debuted as an idol. It is a kids song from a cartoon, but you can still feel she put her heart and soul into it.
p_char_101_sora.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Sora.

p_char_215_mantic.name: Manticore's Token
p_char_215_mantic.description: A violet envelope sealed with a morning glory sticker. Open it and you will find a piece of folded paper saying 'Please be my friend.'
p_char_215_mantic.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Manticore.

p_char_241_panda.name: FEater's Token
p_char_241_panda.description: A poster of an action movie. The star looks a bit familiar.
p_char_241_panda.usage: Used to improve the Potential of FEater.

p_char_220_grani.name: Grani's Token
p_char_220_grani.description: A red police whistle. Blow it and you will feel a sense of justice puffing up your chest.
p_char_220_grani.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Grani.

p_char_164_nightm.name: Nightmare's Token
p_char_164_nightm.description: A cute doll commonly seen in shops. It will look different if placed somewhere dark.
p_char_164_nightm.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Nightmare.

p_char_308_swire.name: Swire's Token
p_char_308_swire.description: A broken police badge. An unknown officer lost it during an important case. No one can tell whose it is, but someone must stand up for justice.
p_char_308_swire.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Swire.

p_char_274_astesi.name: Astesia's Token
p_char_274_astesi.description: A pen filled with special ink. A thousand stars twinkle brightly the moment the pen touches paper.
p_char_274_astesi.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Astesia.

p_char_348_ceylon.name: Ceylon's Token
p_char_348_ceylon.description: A notebook with no more space to write. Here one finds all extant knowledge on Originium research. It's so detailed that it could be published as a book titled Originium Research: From Basics to Mastery.
p_char_348_ceylon.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Ceylon.

p_char_326_glacus.name: Glaucus's Token
p_char_326_glacus.description: A dead battery. The final purpose of a useless item is to be part of a collection.
p_char_326_glacus.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Glaucus.

p_char_275_breeze.name: Breeze's Token
p_char_275_breeze.description: A family seal that has been wiped down so many times that its pattern is fading, still polished and shining impeccably.
p_char_275_breeze.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Breeze.

p_char_131_flameb.name: Flamebringer's Token
p_char_131_flameb.description: An old, bloodstained coat that has burn marks. Can't tell whose blood it is.
p_char_131_flameb.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Flamebringer.

p_char_279_excu.name: Executor's Token
p_char_279_excu.description: A self-defense manual, with comprehensive descriptions of things to pay attention to in most major city-states. Focuses mostly on personal safety and very little on the well-being of the inhabitants.
p_char_279_excu.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Executor.

p_char_261_sddrag.name: Reed's Token
p_char_261_sddrag.description: A short poem written on diary paper. The handwriting is beautiful and delicate, but the words are painful and harrowing.
p_char_261_sddrag.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Reed.

p_char_356_broca.name: Broca's Token
p_char_356_broca.description: An exquisite miniature landscape model of an ancient Siracusan city. Someone stealthily placed it on your desk at some point, and you didn't discover it until you showed up for work the next day.
p_char_356_broca.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Broca.

p_char_243_waaifu.name: Waai Fu's Token
p_char_243_waaifu.description: An old martial arts scroll written in an undiscernable text. At least it'll have some value as a reference material... right?
p_char_243_waaifu.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Waai Fu.

p_char_325_bison.name: Bison's Token
p_char_325_bison.description: A weathered map. The traces of countless miles of voyages are clearly visible, where new plans interweave with past markings. This is the life of a Messenger.
p_char_325_bison.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Bison.

p_char_367_swllow.name: GreyThroat's Token
p_char_367_swllow.description: A broken scalpel, the father's memento. It is difficult to imagine that a doctor who did so much to help the Infected would end up suffering so much torment.
p_char_367_swllow.usage: Used to improve the Potential of GreyThroat.

p_char_226_hmau.name: Hung's Token
p_char_226_hmau.description: A self-authored and compiled cookbook. Its recipes are suitable for any season, featuring dishes that are both easy-to-make and delicious.
p_char_226_hmau.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Hung.

p_char_383_snsant.name: Snowsant's Token
p_char_383_snsant.description: A hand-sewn purse that contains small coins no longer in circulation.
p_char_383_snsant.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Snowsant.

p_char_306_leizi.name: Leizi's Token
p_char_306_leizi.description: An old oak ruler. No ruler markings, no rules.
p_char_306_leizi.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Leizi.

p_char_379_sesa.name: Sesa's Token
p_char_379_sesa.description: A pendant etched with runes, its decoration exaggerated and full of obsession with the past.
p_char_379_sesa.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Sesa.

p_char_252_bibeak.name: Bibeak's Token
p_char_252_bibeak.description: A rough worker's shirt, from when Bibeak first learned to sew. It may not be comfortable to wear, but the heart and soul it exudes is unmistakable.
p_char_252_bibeak.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Bibeak.

p_char_230_savage.name: Savage's Token
p_char_230_savage.description: A necklace made of a string of opals. Hopefully, you will be able to deliver it to its intended recipient.
p_char_230_savage.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Savage.

p_char_254_vodfox.name: Shamare's Token
p_char_254_vodfox.description: An apple with a bite taken out of it. Small teeth marks are still clearly visible.
p_char_254_vodfox.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Shamare.

p_char_333_sidero.name: Sideroca's Token
p_char_333_sidero.description: This shiny figurine seems to hold great significance to Minosians. The patron god of travelers, protector of Sideroca, may now be watching over you.
p_char_333_sidero.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Sideroca.

p_char_401_elysm.name: Elysium's Token
p_char_401_elysm.description: A complex and hand-drawn topographic map. If you can't make any sense of it, perhaps Elysium would be glad to lead the way.
p_char_401_elysm.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Elysium.

p_char_378_asbest.name: Asbestos's Token
p_char_378_asbest.description: A spare spelunking suit. She seems to be implying that if you have the time, you're free to take a walk with her.
p_char_378_asbest.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Asbestos.

p_char_343_tknogi.name: Tsukinogi's Token
p_char_343_tknogi.description: A protective charm made by Tsukinogi. Rumors have it that carrying it calms the spirit and dispels the fear of the darkest nights.
p_char_343_tknogi.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Tsukinogi.

p_char_405_absin.name: Absinthe's Token
p_char_405_absin.description: A large Ursus-style tactical vest. It didn't fit its previous owner well, but she rarely took it off.
p_char_405_absin.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Absinthe.

p_char_373_lionhd.name: Leonhardt's Token
p_char_373_lionhd.description: A pair of trendy limited-edition sneakers. It seems to include a special auxiliary design to accommodate one of Victoria's popular sports, with technical support from Rim Billiton.
p_char_373_lionhd.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Leonhardt.

p_char_294_ayer.name: Ayerscarpe's Token
p_char_294_ayer.description: A self-authored reconnaissance and counter-reconnaissance manual. His thought process was, 'it's best to keep yourself protected under any circumstance.'
p_char_294_ayer.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Ayerscarpe.

p_char_345_folnic.name: Folinic's Token
p_char_345_folnic.description: A popular science poster that explains a variety of subclinical health conditions in detail, along with their treatment methods. Printed on the reverse side are a large number of appalling real cases, for reasons one may never know.
p_char_345_folnic.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Folinic.

p_char_344_beewax.name: Beeswax's Token
p_char_344_beewax.description: A full set of horn care supplies, including essential oils, soft brushes, and sandpaper strips. Custom-made by desert tribes, incredibly expensive and hard to find, you can just use it for a manicure - as long as you can stomach the cost.
p_char_344_beewax.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Beeswax.

p_char_349_chiave.name: Chiave's Token
p_char_349_chiave.description: A badge that he made himself, representing the 'Chiave Gang.' Your name is also engraved upon it.
p_char_349_chiave.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Chiave.

p_char_336_folivo.name: Scene's Token
p_char_336_folivo.description: A brand new camera. True scenic beauty must be captured in person.
p_char_336_folivo.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Scene.

p_char_218_cuttle.name: Andreana's Token
p_char_218_cuttle.description: A handmade model gun, painstakingly crafted by the Operator herself.
p_char_218_cuttle.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Andreana.

p_char_411_tomimi.name: Tomimi's Token
p_char_411_tomimi.description: A dreamcatcher that gives off a comforting fragrance, made by Tomimi herself. Only after a good night's sleep is she able to give her best - this is Tomimi's exclusive secret.
p_char_411_tomimi.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Tomimi.

p_char_415_flint.name: Flint's Token
p_char_415_flint.description: A sharp stone dagger made by Flint herself, normally used by the owner to carve roasted meat. While useful for a variety of outdoor environments, be careful not to cut yourself!
p_char_415_flint.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Flint.

p_char_365_aprl.name: April's Token
p_char_365_aprl.description: An album including the song 'April,' still freshly packaged and tied up in a lovely ribbon.
p_char_365_aprl.usage: Used to improve the Potential of April.

p_char_388_mint.name: Mint's Token
p_char_388_mint.description: An aged hardback book. No one knows if the book will bite until it actually does.
p_char_388_mint.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Mint.

p_char_346_aosta.name: Aosta's Token
p_char_346_aosta.description: A Siracusan-style fedora handcrafted by the man himself. The fabric used in its construction is of very high quality, a clear example of his fine attention to detail.
p_char_346_aosta.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Aosta.

p_char_265_sophia.name: Whislash's Token
p_char_265_sophia.description: A supplementary VIP credit card issued by Golden Palm Bank Kazimierz. Incredibly high limit. Accepted without question in all major cities of Kazimierz.
p_char_265_sophia.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Whislash.

p_char_436_whispr.name: Whisperain's Token
p_char_436_whispr.description: An old-fashioned cinema ticket stub. The proof of a single memory. The ink on it falling off, old and yellowing, becoming indistinct with age.
p_char_436_whispr.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Whisperain.

p_char_214_kafka.name: Kafka's Token
p_char_214_kafka.description: An assiduously cared-for bonsai. Attached is a card, upon which is written: 'I buried a knife in here. It can peel apples, if you ever need.'
p_char_214_kafka.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Kafka.

p_char_451_robin.name: Robin's Token
p_char_451_robin.description: A still-sealed knife. Its design is exquisite, and there are letters engraved on the handle. It appears to be a limited-run tie-in for a movie.
p_char_451_robin.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Robin.

p_char_338_iris.name: Iris's Token
p_char_338_iris.description: A manually bound book of fairytales. A collection never released to the market, each illustration hand-drawn by its creator.
p_char_338_iris.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Iris.

p_char_402_tuye.name: Tuye's Token
p_char_402_tuye.description: A vial of nutritional fluid. Hand crafted by the outstanding medical operator Tuye, it gives off a peculiar smell. Whether and when to drink it remain questions you have to think over for yourself.
p_char_402_tuye.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Tuye.

p_char_455_nothin.name: Mr. Nothing's Token
p_char_455_nothin.description: A paper fan, its frame made of special materials, on it written 'nonexistent and nothing.'
p_char_455_nothin.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Mr. Nothing.

p_char_1011_lava2.name: Lava the Purgatory's Token
p_char_1011_lava2.description: A sheath covered in scars. The once distinctive patterns she'd engraved herself have been worn away through constant use, the lines now invisible.
p_char_1011_lava2.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Lava the Purgatory.

p_char_457_blitz.name: Blitz's Token
p_char_457_blitz.description: A complete set of linguistics books and comprehensive, well-organized notes. They seem to annotate comparisons between nouns across different languages.
p_char_457_blitz.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Blitz.

p_char_458_rfrost.name: Frost's Token
p_char_458_rfrost.description: A set of handmade survival tools. She wants to convey to you that survival is a matter of skill, not brute force.
p_char_458_rfrost.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Frost.

p_char_459_tachak.name: Tachanka's Token
p_char_459_tachak.description: A set of dolls made from wood and the carapace of Originium slugs. Starting from the largest doll, they can be nestled within each other.
p_char_459_tachak.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Tachanka.

p_char_363_toddi.name: Toddifons's Token
p_char_363_toddi.description: A delicately cut icosahedral crystal gemstone. By her logic, things you slough off onto others in passing can't be called gifts.
p_char_363_toddi.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Toddifons.

p_char_304_zebra.name: Heavyrain's Token
p_char_304_zebra.description: A small-form shield, apparently personally forged under Vulcan's guidance. Very lightweight, but very firm.
p_char_304_zebra.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Heavyrain.

p_char_475_akafyu.name: Akafuyu's Token
p_char_475_akafyu.description: A helping of raw, worked meat. Only those who eat heartily and leave an empty plate can be called good buddies.
p_char_475_akafyu.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Akafuyu.

p_char_478_kirara.name: Kirara's Token
p_char_478_kirara.description: [Shinobi Ex Machina 2] Collector's Edition. The launch collector's edition of a classic Higashi game. She's dying to share all her favorites with you.
p_char_478_kirara.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Kirara.

p_char_369_bena.name: Bena's Token
p_char_369_bena.description: A set of fine pocket-sized clothing. Not wearable by humans, but they can be stood up on your desk as display items.
p_char_369_bena.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Bena.

p_char_421_crow.name: La Pluma's Token
p_char_421_crow.description: A copy of the 'Dossoles Guide to Cocktails,' with plenty of recipes full of her notes on the side. These all seem to be her specialties—if you've got time to spare, you can order a round from her.
p_char_421_crow.usage: Used to improve the Potential of La Pluma.

p_char_486_takila.name: Tequila's Token
p_char_486_takila.description: A nameplate with a full name and date inscribed. Ever since the day he obtained it, Tequila has always carried it on him. Now's the time for him to let it go.
p_char_486_takila.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Tequila.

p_char_473_mberry.name: Mulberry's Token
p_char_473_mberry.description: Adorned with Yan's characteristic red protective charms. Mulberry asked for this amulet back specifically for you. Incomprehensible Yan characters are written on it, and an almost imperceptible scent of incense seems to linger.
p_char_473_mberry.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Mulberry.

p_char_431_ashlok.name: Ashlock's Token
p_char_431_ashlok.description: A shell casing left over from a shot, bearing Ashlock's signature. This once brought her victory, and now, it belongs to you.
p_char_431_ashlok.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Ashlock.

p_char_449_glider.name: Honeyberry's Token
p_char_449_glider.description: A berry plant grown by Honeyberry. Its form has beauty, its fruits are tart, sweet and delicious, and the whole of it can be used medicinally. A new, never-before-found cultivar.
p_char_449_glider.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Honeyberry.

p_char_496_wildmn.name: Wild Mane's Token
p_char_496_wildmn.description: A splinter of the major lance's damaged outer shell, kept preciously safe by Wild Mane. A reminder to herself that every battle comes with a cost, and you need to think things through.
p_char_496_wildmn.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Wild Mane.

p_char_489_serum.name: Corroserum's Token
p_char_489_serum.description: A reagent bottle with label after label thickly pasted over it. 'Anti-corrosive coating reagent,' 'anti-anti-corrosive coating reagent,' 'anti-anti-...anti-anti-corrosive coating reagent,' the font is smaller and smaller. Er, seriously?
p_char_489_serum.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Corroserum.

p_char_422_aurora.name: Aurora's Token
p_char_422_aurora.description: A combination lock. You can open the toolbox she carries, and you're allowed to use the stuff inside.
p_char_422_aurora.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Aurora.

p_char_4013_kjera.name: Kjera's Token
p_char_4013_kjera.description: A hand-knitted scarf. The materials are excessive, and you'd find it hot even wearing it in Kjerag. No unusual features at all, just the craftsmanship that goes into knitting a fine scarf like this is already enough to make you gasp in admiration.
p_char_4013_kjera.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Kjera.

p_char_4025_aprot2.name: Shalem's Token
p_char_4025_aprot2.description: A shattered emblem, upon it carved the Crimson Troupe's design. Shalem preserves this part of the past, as if he long foresaw a day he'd hand it over.
p_char_4025_aprot2.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Shalem.

p_char_476_blkngt.name: Blacknight's Token
p_char_476_blkngt.description: A knitted nightcap. It's made roughly, but is very soft to the touch.
p_char_476_blkngt.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Blacknight.

p_char_492_quercu.name: Quercus's Token
p_char_492_quercu.description: An vacant flowerpot filled only with soil. The soil was brought from the earth of her homeland. If you're ever at leisure, you can go ask her for some seeds.
p_char_492_quercu.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Quercus.

p_char_1021_kroos2.name: Kroos the Keen Glint’s Token
p_char_1021_kroos2.description:
A sucker arrow, several small bells tied to the fletching.
With this arrow, you can provide a name, and so long as it's present on Rhodes Island and can be shot, she'll land this straight on the target.
p_char_1021_kroos2.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Kroos the Keen Glint.

p_char_4016_kazema.name: Kazemaru's Token
p_char_4016_kazema.description: A vividly colored pendant that rustles. Handcrafted by Kazemaru herself.
p_char_4016_kazema.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Kazemaru.

p_char_4036_forcer.name: Enforcer's Token
p_char_4036_forcer.description:
A can of sugar-free coffee. Portable and ready to drink.
The finest choice for those times when you can't make coffee, but need a caffeine boost. That is, if you can stand its bitter taste.
p_char_4036_forcer.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Enforcer.

p_char_4040_rockr.name: Rockrock's Token
p_char_4040_rockr.description: A crudely assembled pair of scissors, rarely used. Meant for snipping bindings. Guard of the past, she wishes to see you off as you head for the future.
p_char_4040_rockr.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Rockrock.

p_char_4045_heidi.name: Heidi's Token
p_char_4045_heidi.description: A notebook comprised of awkward handwriting and yellowed pages. She often still dreams of sitting at her writing desk in the County of Toron, the forest of oaks beyond her window blanketed by the snowstorm.
p_char_4045_heidi.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Heidi.

p_char_433_windft.name: Windflit's Token
p_char_433_windft.description: A case of wear-resistant adhesive bandages, carried on Windflit's person. Used until worn-through, and then he's plus one callus, minus one plaster.
p_char_433_windft.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Windflit.

p_char_4043_erato.name: Erato's Token
p_char_4043_erato.description: A notebook filled with mythic legends and poems for the wayward bard. The language isn't flowery per se, but passion and sincerity abound as you read it.
p_char_4043_erato.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Erato.

p_char_1024_hbisc2.name: Hibiscus the Purifier's Token
p_char_1024_hbisc2.description: A small flower folded from paper. It has become Hibiscus's habit to leave a small memento like this next to the bed of each patient as they are about to be discharged.
p_char_1024_hbisc2.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Hibiscus the Purifier.

p_char_4047_pianst.name: Czerny's Token
p_char_4047_pianst.description: An old-fashioned, time-worn metronome that has accompanied Czerny since his brief yet happy formative years.
p_char_4047_pianst.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Czerny.

p_char_1027_greyy2.name: Greyy the Lightningbearer's Token
p_char_1027_greyy2.description: A dissertation. These few sheets of paper depict the young Perro's ideals over the past few years.
p_char_1027_greyy2.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Greyy the Lightningbearer.

p_char_135_halo.name: Astgenne's Token
p_char_135_halo.description: A handmade model of a comet. Let the past be the past and instead take hold of the future.
p_char_135_halo.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Astgenne.

p_char_497_ctable.name: Cantabile's Token
p_char_497_ctable.description: A small lyre, all weapons removed. Can tug heartstrings with simply a strum, bringing your thoughts back down in the heat of chaos.
p_char_497_ctable.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Cantabile.

p_char_4054_malist.name: Minimalist's Token
p_char_4054_malist.description: A pencil stub, worn beyond further use. At the end of its life, it has drawn up the most wondrous designs.
p_char_4054_malist.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Minimalist.

p_char_4032_provs.name: Proviso's Token
p_char_4032_provs.description: A book of analysis of Kazimierz law, rife with notes. Countless underlines stress key points, growing steadily more useless the more they're made.
p_char_4032_provs.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Proviso.

p_char_4071_peper.name: Paprika's Token
p_char_4071_peper.description: Fluffy ear mufflers. Lovely and warm in the cold, they'll keep your whole body safe and were hand-knitted by the girl herself.
p_char_4071_peper.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Paprika.

p_char_157_dagda.name: Dagda's Token
p_char_157_dagda.description: A page from the Book of the Tower Knights. On it is Isabelle 'Dagda' Montague's name, followed by a large blank space below, waiting to be filled in.
p_char_157_dagda.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Dagda.

p_char_103_angel.name: Exusiai's Token
p_char_103_angel.description: A Best Boss medal. Collect five of these to exchange for a Super Boss medal.
p_char_103_angel.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Exusiai.

p_char_112_siege.name: Siege's Token
p_char_112_siege.description: A large, hard rivet. Made by workers in Londinium, it will return to its homeland in the end.
p_char_112_siege.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Siege.

p_char_134_ifrit.name: Ifrit's Token
p_char_134_ifrit.description: A long novel telling a legendary story. It is badly burned and you can only barely make out the words.
p_char_134_ifrit.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Ifrit.

p_char_180_amgoat.name: Eyjafjalla's Token
p_char_180_amgoat.description: A small pair of scissors. The handle is carefully wrapped in heat-resistant cloth.
p_char_180_amgoat.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Eyjafjalla.

p_char_291_aglina.name: Angelina's Token
p_char_291_aglina.description: A lime flavored lip balm. The wind in the wilds is as dry as the nights in the city.
p_char_291_aglina.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Angelina.

p_char_147_shining.name: Shining's Token
p_char_147_shining.description: A white pendant. It looks normal, but it cannot be stained by dust.
p_char_147_shining.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Shining.

p_char_179_cgbird.name: Nightingale's Token
p_char_179_cgbird.description: A box of messy puzzles. The real problem is many pieces are missing.
p_char_179_cgbird.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Nightingale.

p_char_136_hsguma.name: Hoshiguma's Token
p_char_136_hsguma.description: An old manga. It tells the story of an unknown monster becoming a hero with the help of his friends.
p_char_136_hsguma.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Hoshiguma.

p_char_202_demkni.name: Saria's Token
p_char_202_demkni.description: Several security cooperation contracts. Some of them already have a gray calcareous stamp on them.
p_char_202_demkni.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Saria.

p_char_172_svrash.name: SilverAsh's Token
p_char_172_svrash.description: One of only a few extant Originium Ice crystals that represent sincerity. It will never melt.
p_char_172_svrash.usage: Used to improve the Potential of SilverAsh.

p_char_263_skadi.name: Skadi's Token
p_char_263_skadi.description: A song written in her mother tongue. Although you can't understand a word of it, she IS going to teach it to you.
p_char_263_skadi.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Skadi.

p_char_010_chen.name: Ch'en's Token
p_char_010_chen.description: This thing has been sealed for a long time. She didn't forget it. It's just that she can't bear to touch that rusty point again. Perhaps someday it will burn again.
p_char_010_chen.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Ch'en.

p_char_340_shwaz.name: Schwarz's Token
p_char_340_shwaz.description: A crossbow. Well maintained and easy to use. But the tiny scratches and dents on it provide some insight into all the killing it has done.
p_char_340_shwaz.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Schwarz.

p_char_188_helage.name: Hellagur's Token
p_char_188_helage.description: A thick thread-bound book that will never be lent to anyone else. Its pages describe the decades of war in Ursus, and the dried ink carries a long history of suffering.
p_char_188_helage.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Hellagur.

p_char_248_mgllan.name: Magallan's Token
p_char_248_mgllan.description: A fossilized branch covered in snow. The mighty tree this came from once spread its roots throughout the land, but this branch is all that remains to tell its story.
p_char_248_mgllan.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Magallan.

p_char_213_mostma.name: Mostima's Token
p_char_213_mostma.description: It's her blunderbuss. She doesn't need it anymore.
p_char_213_mostma.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Mostima.

p_char_225_haak.name: Aak's Token
p_char_225_haak.description: A bottle filled with 6 different-colored pills. No instructions are provided.
p_char_225_haak.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Aak.

p_char_2014_nian.name: Nian's Token
p_char_2014_nian.description: A simple, antique dagger. Legend holds that if this dagger is ever lifted with an intent to murder, the blade will disappear.
p_char_2014_nian.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Nian.

p_char_017_huang.name: Blaze's Token
p_char_017_huang.description: A glass bottle with hard-to-discern contents inside. After being shaken a few times, the bottle heats up, making it perfect for keeping one's hands warm in the winter.
p_char_017_huang.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Blaze.

p_char_2013_cerber.name: Ceobe's Token
p_char_2013_cerber.description: An origami knife that took a long time to fold. It's crooked, full of extra creases, and rough around the edges. Wonder if the recipient will like it?
p_char_2013_cerber.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Ceobe.

p_char_222_bpipe.name: Bagpipe's Token
p_char_222_bpipe.description: A handful of quinoa. The land breeds life, and life returns to feed the land.
p_char_222_bpipe.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Bagpipe.

p_char_250_phatom.name: Phantom's Token
p_char_250_phatom.description: An old music score. The notes upon the manuscript have long been blurred by the passage of time.
p_char_250_phatom.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Phantom.

p_char_400_weedy.name: Weedy's Token
p_char_400_weedy.description: A stack of Bionic Seadragon designs, including a lot of hand-written notes she made herself. 'Even a monkey could produce a new one,' or something like that.
p_char_400_weedy.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Weedy.

p_char_113_cqbw.name: W's Token
p_char_113_cqbw.description: A selfie of W making a peace-sign gesture. In the corner is another white-haired Sarkaz woman who is standing not far away, seemingly talking with others.
p_char_113_cqbw.usage: Used to improve the Potential of W.

p_char_197_poca.name: Rosa's Token
p_char_197_poca.description: A paper cutter. She solemnly handed it to you, but you're not sure why.
p_char_197_poca.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Rosa.

p_char_358_lisa.name: Suzuran's Token
p_char_358_lisa.description: A handful of lily-of-the-valley flowers. When Lisa was asked what she had in mind for her code name, she happened to have her arms around a pot filled with these flowers.
p_char_358_lisa.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Suzuran.

p_char_293_thorns.name: Thorns' Token
p_char_293_thorns.description: A small vial of medicinal fluid, a reminder of some of his earliest work; Danger, use with caution.
p_char_293_thorns.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Thorns.

p_char_416_zumama.name: Eunectes' Token
p_char_416_zumama.description: A wrench that seems to been used for a long time. Useful for mechanical manufacturing, or self-defense in a pinch.
p_char_416_zumama.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Eunectes.

p_char_350_surtr.name: Surtr's Token
p_char_350_surtr.description: A photocopied document filled with place names, several of which have been crossed out in red. If you have time, you can help scout these locations.
p_char_350_surtr.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Surtr.

p_char_423_blemsh.name: Blemishine's Token
p_char_423_blemsh.description: A book of a knight's tale; an absurd legend, legendary absurdity.
p_char_423_blemsh.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Blemishine.

p_char_391_rosmon.name: Rosmontis' Token
p_char_391_rosmon.description: A plant specimen, delicately made yet still very amateur. She hopes with all her heart that you can help her remember this.
p_char_391_rosmon.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Rosmontis.

p_char_311_mudrok.name: Mudrock's Token
p_char_311_mudrok.description: A tiny little rock sculture. It looks like it's 'gazing' at you inquisitively.
p_char_311_mudrok.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Mudrock.

p_char_264_f12yin.name: Mountain's Token
p_char_264_f12yin.description: A fine grape wine, all wrapped up. Its place of origin appears to be a very famed Columbian winery; we don't know by what means he obtained it.
p_char_264_f12yin.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Mountain.

p_char_332_archet.name: Archetto's Token
p_char_332_archet.description: A Monastery limited commemoration badge. Meant to be bought, but just call this one a gift of friendship!
p_char_332_archet.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Archetto.

p_char_2015_dusk.name: Dusk's Token
p_char_2015_dusk.description: A seemingly ordinary brush. Dusk's brushes can give rise to all life as well as brushstrokes. Be a little careful when using it.
p_char_2015_dusk.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Dusk.

p_char_362_saga.name: Saga's Token
p_char_362_saga.description: A wooden fish she carved by herself. When on edge, just chant the sutras with her.
p_char_362_saga.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Saga.

p_char_456_ash.name: Ash's Token
p_char_456_ash.description: A postcard, upon which is a proverb written in letters you've never seen before. It seems to say, 'the only thing that comes from waiting is old age.'
p_char_456_ash.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Ash.

p_char_472_pasngr.name: Passenger's Token
p_char_472_pasngr.description: An ancient Sargon gold coin. Sent to and fro by the long hands of fate, it now belongs to you.
p_char_472_pasngr.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Passenger.

p_char_1012_skadi2.name: Skadi the Corrupting Heart's Token
p_char_1012_skadi2.description: A curved quill formed of cartilage. A light blue liquid drips from the quill's point, violently transforming an experimental organism's physiological structure.
p_char_1012_skadi2.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Skadi the Corrupting Heart.

p_char_003_kalts.name: Kal'tsit's Token
p_char_003_kalts.description: An unusual pocket watch, of a format never before seen in any country. Engraved on it are four dates across as many years, as well as a few crooked letters.
p_char_003_kalts.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Kal'tsit.

p_char_474_glady.name: Gladiia's Token
p_char_474_glady.description: A small, black device of incomprehensible makeup. The three buttons on it seem to respectively be a knife, a skull and some sort of design of a creature, and don't quite scream to be pushed.
p_char_474_glady.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Gladiia.

p_char_426_billro.name: Carnelian's Token
p_char_426_billro.description: A small souvenir collected by travelers. She's spoken of the place she bought this souvenir having such good views, and that next time, she'll take you with her to see them.
p_char_426_billro.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Carnelian.

p_char_485_pallas.name: Pallas's Token
p_char_485_pallas.description: A Minos hero's epic. 'The hero came from the commoners, and returned to amongst the commoners.' This line, at the head of the poem, has been circled.
p_char_485_pallas.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Pallas.

p_char_1013_chen2.name: Ch'en the Holungday's Token
p_char_1013_chen2.description: A notebook, densely packed with Ch'en's records of her investigation in Dossoles, and a few of her thoughts. She seems to be implying she's seeking your opinions, though of course, she hasn't said that outright.
p_char_1013_chen2.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Ch'en the Holungday.

p_char_437_mizuki.name: Mizuki's Token
p_char_437_mizuki.description: One of some classic video game's commemoration badges distributed for its 40th anniversary. The characters that appear on them each have completely different expressions, and are so cute you could just open wide and—
p_char_437_mizuki.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Mizuki.

p_char_430_fartth.name: Fartooth's Token
p_char_430_fartth.description: A rough, handmade piccolo. Fartooth made it herself, and it is capable of producing a few simple sounds. The craftsmanship was simple, so the prickly splinters have been meticulously smoothed over.
p_char_430_fartth.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Fartooth.

p_char_479_sleach.name: Saileach's Token
p_char_479_sleach.description: A small segment of a dried willow branch. Each bud is still perfectly intact, as if it could grow once more if dipped into water.
p_char_479_sleach.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Saileach.

p_char_1014_nearl2.name: Nearl the Radiant Knight's Token
p_char_1014_nearl2.description: A Kazimierzian knightly coat of arms, restored to splendor. After a meticulous polishing, the pegasus’s golden wings give off an awe-inspiring glow.
p_char_1014_nearl2.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Nearl the Radiant Knight.

p_char_420_flamtl.name: Flametail's Token
p_char_420_flamtl.description: A seemingly mundane Kazimierzian coin. This was the sole reward Sona earned from her first victory in the underground arena.
p_char_420_flamtl.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Flametail.

p_char_206_gnosis.name: Gnosis's Token
p_char_206_gnosis.description: A self-defense dagger he forged after his arrival at Rhodes Island. You only found out far later, by pure chance, that this is one of the ways the Edelweisses show their friendship.
p_char_206_gnosis.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Gnosis.

p_char_322_lmlee.name: Lee's Token
p_char_322_lmlee.description: A ring-shaped jade pendant of unassuming appearance. You're unable to judge its value.
p_char_322_lmlee.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Lee.

p_char_377_gdglow.name: Goldenglow's Token
p_char_377_gdglow.description:
A bottle of unique body lotion. You hear it's effective in reducing static shock once applied.
Even if it's a bust, at least it's good for your skin.
p_char_377_gdglow.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Goldenglow.

p_char_2023_ling.name: Ling's Token
p_char_2023_ling.description: A lantern. You're absolutely sure you once saw this in some late-night dream. Lanterns light the eve, arrows fall as rain, the desert flared with fire.
p_char_2023_ling.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Ling.

p_char_300_phenxi.name: Fiammetta's Token
p_char_300_phenxi.description:
A bullet-shaped hazelnut lollipop. An unofficial ration of the Laterano Notarial Hall.
Supposedly the Pope's favorite, although he claims all Lateran treats as his favorite.
p_char_300_phenxi.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Fiammetta.

p_char_4039_horn.name: Horn's Token
p_char_4039_horn.description: A notebook. The names of several musical instruments are fastidiously written on the first page. What she's sharing with you is intel, but at the same time, memories.
p_char_4039_horn.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Horn.

p_char_1023_ghost2.name: Specter the Unchained's Token
p_char_1023_ghost2.description: A detail-rich sculpture. Artwork only possesses meaning when left in the hands of those who know to appreciate it.
p_char_1023_ghost2.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Specter the Unchained.

p_char_4009_irene.name: Irene's Token
p_char_4009_irene.description: A small chunk of ochre reef, having undergone centuries of baptism upon Iberia's coastline before being handed to you.
p_char_4009_irene.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Irene.

p_char_4042_lumen.name: Lumen's Token
p_char_4042_lumen.description: A simple light-emitting unit, employing some fascinating technologies. The handiwork of Lumen in his spare time. You hear the theory behind it comes from the lighthouse research notes left by his parents.
p_char_4042_lumen.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Lumen.

p_char_4046_ebnhlz.name: Ebenholz's Token
p_char_4046_ebnhlz.description: A Leithanian coin with a crudely drilled hole in its center. Only he knows how much sweat and tears were poured into that hole when a skilled artisan would have been able to make it effortlessly.
p_char_4046_ebnhlz.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Ebenholz.

p_char_4048_doroth.name: Dorothy's Token
p_char_4048_doroth.description: A tube of unknown reagent identical to what flows in her body. Must never be used.
p_char_4048_doroth.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Dorothy.

p_char_1026_gvial2.name: Gavial the Invincible's Token
p_char_1026_gvial2.description: An excessively dense alloy dumbbell, while appearing deceptively liftable. Gavial neglected to tell you its weight when she gave it to you, and you had to spend half an hour soothing your poor, pulled back.
p_char_1026_gvial2.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Gavial the Invincible.

p_char_4055_bgsnow.name: Pozëmka's Token
p_char_4055_bgsnow.description: A pile of manuscript paper. Her strength and cowardice are written within in their fullest, nothing withheld.
p_char_4055_bgsnow.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Pozëmka.

p_char_4064_mlynar.name: Młynar's Token
p_char_4064_mlynar.description: A letter opener of classical design, having opened up the joys and sorrows of hundreds of lives. It's been close to the sharpest thing he's held for a long, long time.
p_char_4064_mlynar.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Młynar.

p_char_4072_ironmn.name: Stainless's Token
p_char_4072_ironmn.description: Brand new zipline equipment. The parts that come in contact with the body are softer than on mass-produced ziplines, guarding against friction burns that might occur during high-speed movement.
p_char_4072_ironmn.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Stainless.

voucher_full_ceylon.name: Ceylon's Personal Letter
voucher_full_ceylon.description: The letter makes mention of progress on a near-future Originium academic course, hopes for the new city of Siesta, and care for how Schwarz is doing.
voucher_full_ceylon.usage: A personal letter sent to the Doctor, used to improve Ceylon to Max Potential.

voucher_full_grani.name: Grani's Personal Letter
voucher_full_grani.description: The letter only contains a few simple well-wishes—its writer, likely right at the Doctor's side by the time the letter lands on the desk.
voucher_full_grani.usage: A personal letter sent to the Doctor, used to improve Grani to Max Potential.

voucher_full_flameb.name: Flamebringer's Personal Letter
voucher_full_flameb.description: A letter that discusses floriculture, the life philosophy derived from it, and the sender's pointed feelings about the Doctor.
voucher_full_flameb.usage: A personal letter sent to the Doctor, used to improve Flamebringer to Max Potential.

voucher_full_bison.name: Bison's Personal Letter
voucher_full_bison.description: The letter talks about his own situation, his impressions of the Penguin Logistics employees he's come into contact with, and his outlook on the future.
voucher_full_bison.usage: A personal letter sent to the Doctor, used to improve Bison to Max Potential.

voucher_full_snsant.name: Snowsant's Personal Letter
voucher_full_snsant.description: The letter writes of self-researched projects' various details, applications for funding, as well as heartfelt thanks to the Doctor.
voucher_full_snsant.usage: A personal letter sent to the Doctor, used to improve Snowsant to Max Potential.

voucher_full_sidero.name: Sideroca's Personal Letter
voucher_full_sidero.description: The letter contains an everyday greeting, a recipe under development, an exhortation to work out, and overflowing ambition.
voucher_full_sidero.usage: A personal letter sent to the Doctor, used to improve Sideroca to Max Potential.

voucher_full_absin.name: Absinthe's Personal Letter
voucher_full_absin.description: The letter talks of how her acclimation to Rhodes Island is going, and of the sense she's making of the chaos in Ursus and the way she sees it.
voucher_full_absin.usage: A personal letter sent to the Doctor, used to improve Absinthe to Max Potential.

voucher_full_folnic.name: Folinic's Personal Letter
voucher_full_folnic.description: The letter briefly goes into the results of her research and the progress of her mission; a significant majority of the rest is simply her concerns and repeated urgings, enough to give you a minor headache.
voucher_full_folnic.usage: A personal letter sent to the Doctor, used to improve Folinic to Max Potential.

voucher_full_mint.name: Mint's Personal Letter
voucher_full_mint.description: The letter mentions how she has acclimated to Rhodes Island, the books she has been reading of late, as well as the results of her geological research.
voucher_full_mint.usage: A personal letter sent to the Doctor, used to improve Mint to Max Potential.

voucher_full_tomimi.name: Tomimi's Personal Letter
voucher_full_tomimi.description: The letter writes of fashion, Gavial, and her hoarded treasures, not to mention Gavial.
voucher_full_tomimi.usage: A personal letter sent to the Doctor, used to improve Tomimi to Max Potential.

voucher_full_sophia.name: Whislash's Personal Letter
voucher_full_sophia.description: The letter writes colorfully of her leisure time, as well as her few little gripes with the Operator training process. Attached is a signed check with no monetary amount filled in.
voucher_full_sophia.usage: A personal letter sent to the Doctor, used to improve Whislash to Max Potential.

uni_set_guitar.name: Heart of Surging Flame Furniture Pack
uni_set_guitar.description: The Procurement Department's reconnected with its suppliers, and replenished stocks of initially limited pieces of furniture! Give your thanks to Closure!
uni_set_guitar.usage: Obtain all 'Rhodes Island Modern Music Rehearsal Room' furniture exclusive to the Heart of Surging Flame event not yet acquired.

uni_set_pizza.name: Grani and the Knights' Treasure Furniture Pack
uni_set_pizza.description: As long as you hand the order over to Closure, she'll help you get your hands on any furniture you don't already own. Don't worry, she's not losing out.
uni_set_pizza.usage: Obtain all 'Express Chain Pizzeria' furniture exclusive to the Grani and the Knights' Treasure event not yet acquired.

uni_set_penguin.name: Code of Brawl Furniture Pack
uni_set_penguin.description: The Procurement Department's reconnected with its suppliers, and replenished stocks of initially limited pieces of furniture! Give your thanks to Closure!
uni_set_penguin.usage: Obtain all 'Penguin Logistics Safehouse' furniture exclusive to the Code of Brawl event not yet acquired.

ap_item_amiya.name: Amiya's Grilled Flavor Biscuit
ap_item_amiya.description: Full of carbohydrates, this food is said to appear after a tsunami, making it a product of a Catastrophe. Perhaps seeking comfort in food is one of our natural instincts.
ap_item_amiya.usage: Used to restore Sanity. Will be consumed upon receipt. Ready to eat.

ap_item_chen.description: Full of carbohydrates, this food is said to appear after a tsunami, making it a product of a Catastrophe. Perhaps seeking comfort in food is one of our natural instincts.
ap_item_chen.usage: Used to restore Sanity. Will be consumed upon receipt. Ready to eat.

ap_item_slchan.name: Cliffheart's Grilled Flavor Biscuit
ap_item_slchan.description: Full of carbohydrates, this food is said to appear after a tsunami, making it a product of a Catastrophe. Perhaps seeking comfort in food is one of our natural instincts.
ap_item_slchan.usage: Used to restore Sanity. Will be consumed upon receipt. Ready to eat.

ap_item_SEC_60.name: Salted Egg Yolk Flavor Chocolate
ap_item_SEC_60.description: I'm not sure when it first started, but ever since that time, the salted egg yolk-flavored food craze has swept the world. It's as if everywhere I look is salted egg yolk. I try to my avert my eyes, but nothing but salted egg yolk awaits me. All of this makes me... unable to refuse.
ap_item_SEC_60.usage: Edible product used to restore Sanity. Will be consumed upon receipt. Ready to eat.

ap_item_CaH_200.name: Burger Set for Two
ap_item_CaH_200.description: A burger meal for two bought at a chain fast food restaurant popular in many cities. The taste and size of the burgers is perfect. It's just that the set only includes 1 cup of Dr. Cinnamon, which may lead to the ice melting into the drink as the two diners each try to let the other enjoy it.
ap_item_CaH_200.usage: Edible product used to restore Sanity. Will be consumed upon receipt. Ready to eat.

CRISIS_RUNE_COIN.name: Operation Agreement
CRISIS_RUNE_COIN.description: The elimination of chaos does not necessarily ensure the establishment of order. 'Natural disasters turn into man-made disasters,' but the Contingency Contract system at least provides you with a solution.
CRISIS_RUNE_COIN.usage: A symbol of cooperation. Can be used to unlock additional content in Contingency Contract.

1stact.name: Bounty Coin
1stact.description: A fortune coin used as an amulet by most bounty hunters. When these coins appear, it means their luck has run out.
1stact.usage: Can be exchanged for all kinds of supplies.

act1d0_token_gold_rep_1.name: Bounty Coin
act1d0_token_gold_rep_1.description: A fortune coin used as an amulet by most bounty hunters. When these coins appear, it means their luck has run out.
act1d0_token_gold_rep_1.usage: Can be exchanged for all kinds of supplies.

token_Wristband.name: Obsidian Festival Bracelet
token_Wristband.description: The bracelets are costly to make, so we are not gonna let them just get thrown away!
token_Wristband.usage: Recyclable entry identification bracelet for the Obsidian Festival. Can be used to redeem rewards.
token_Wristband.obtainApproach: Limited-time Event Missions, Daily Event Missions

et_ObsidianPass.name: Obsidian Festival Ticket
et_ObsidianPass.description: A through ticket system has been implemented across the various venues at this Obsidian Festival, which means tickets are required for most events. So please make good use of the tickets you have!
et_ObsidianPass.usage: A ticket to the Obsidian Festival. Can be used to enter special stages.

token_Obsidian.name: Siesta Obsidian
token_Obsidian.description: Just collect them regardless of what they can do. Surely the marketing department will find some use for them.
token_Obsidian.usage: Obsidian crystal mined from Siesta. Can be used to redeem rewards.

token_ObsidianCoin.name: Obsidian Festival Token
token_ObsidianCoin.description: The demand from Obsidian Festival participants is so exceedingly high that they have yet to be met even after repeated reward restocking. Unfortunately, stopping the raffle at this time would mean triggering a riot, so the hosts have to keep the raffle going.
token_ObsidianCoin.usage: Official token for the Obsidian Festival raffle event. Can be used to draw rewards.

clue_Heavymetal_1.name: Heavy Metal Trend 1
clue_Heavymetal_1.description: It's all about the heavy metal bands at the Obsidian Festival.
clue_Heavymetal_1.usage: Chat messages on the local tourist terminal.

clue_Heavymetal_2.name: Heavy Metal Trend 2
clue_Heavymetal_2.description: They said an expensive enough guitar would go un-smashed.
clue_Heavymetal_2.usage: Chat messages on the local tourist terminal.

clue_Heavymetal_3.name: Heavy Metal Trend 3
clue_Heavymetal_3.description: In fact, most people are just coming along for the ride, and going too fast only makes them panic.
clue_Heavymetal_3.usage: Chat messages on the local tourist terminal.

clue_Heavymetal_4.name: Heavy Metal Trend 4
clue_Heavymetal_4.description: Envy is a very common motif. And the word is short.
clue_Heavymetal_4.usage: Chat messages on the local tourist terminal.

clue_Heavymetal_5.name: Heavy Metal Trend 5
clue_Heavymetal_5.description: Costuming really has nothing to do with the speed of the performance.
clue_Heavymetal_5.usage: Chat messages on the local tourist terminal.

clue_EDM_1.name: EDM Trend 1
clue_EDM_1.description: Seems to be comments from some electronic music fans.
clue_EDM_1.usage: Chat messages on the local tourist terminal.

clue_EDM_2.name: EDM Trend 2
clue_EDM_2.description: Remember to stay hydrated on the dance floor.
clue_EDM_2.usage: Chat messages on the local tourist terminal.

clue_EDM_3.name: EDM Trend 3
clue_EDM_3.description: Electronic music fans are a breed of their own.
clue_EDM_3.usage: Chat messages on the local tourist terminal.

clue_EDM_4.name: EDM Trend 4
clue_EDM_4.description: DJs start composing their own songs when they are unsatisfied with the existing ones.
clue_EDM_4.usage: Chat messages on the local tourist terminal.

clue_EDM_5.name: EDM Trend 5
clue_EDM_5.description: Even DJs struggle to get visas to certain countries. Or rather they're even less likely to get approved.
clue_EDM_5.usage: Chat messages on the local tourist terminal.

clue_Rap_1.name: Rap Trend 1
clue_Rap_1.description: Yo, bro, what's up? Too hard to rhyme?
clue_Rap_1.usage: Chat messages on the local tourist terminal.

clue_Rap_2.name: Rap Trend 2
clue_Rap_2.description: Don't take your eyes off a man with a gun. Rapping angels are a lot of fun.
clue_Rap_2.usage: Chat messages on the local tourist terminal.

clue_Rap_3.name: Rap Trend 3
clue_Rap_3.description: Fight your battles with words, not with blades. Criminal activity won't be tolerated in Siesta.
clue_Rap_3.usage: Chat messages on the local tourist terminal.

clue_Rap_4.name: Rap Trend 4
clue_Rap_4.description: A bunch of people always get arrested at the Obsidian Festival and end up permanently denied entry. Too bad for them.
clue_Rap_4.usage: Chat messages on the local tourist terminal.

clue_Rap_5.name: Rap Trend 5
clue_Rap_5.description: Do you know how many rappers are there in Columbia?
clue_Rap_5.usage: Chat messages on the local tourist terminal.
